PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Cola brown colour; fairly intense aroma of herbs, burnt caramel, chocolate & dried wood tones; good balance of sweet fruit and bitter finish

World-renowned Baileys is a natural marriage of fresh Irish dairy cream and Irish Whiskey. Fragrant and flavourful with fresh coffee, hazelnut and chocolate notes; sweet, creamy and thick yet well-balanced by a smooth whiskey note for a smooth, lingering finish.

World-renowned Baileys is a natural marriage of fresh Irish dairy cream and Irish Whiskey. Fragrant and flavourful with fresh coffee, hazelnut and chocolate notes; sweet, creamy and thick yet well-balanced by a smooth whiskey note for a smooth, lingering finish.

A distinctive, all-natural lager that's fire-brewed. Light amber colour. Shows aromas and flavours of sweet malt, brown bread, caramel and floral hops with yeast and tree fruit notes. The palate is medium bodied, well balanced and rounded with a crisp, refreshing finish. Match to sports bar fare, such as burgers and wings.

This premium vodka showcases subtle aromas and flavours. Triple distillation and charcoal filtration make this very smooth and clean tasting. It is easy-to-use and perfect for mixing up your favourite cocktail; try it in a Prince Igor Moscow Mule.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Bertani Villa Arvedi Amarone della Valpolicella 2010

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: L'Amarone della Valpolicella Valpantena Villa Arvedi 2010 semble avoir t cr spcifiquement pour le consommateur qui n'a jamais encore essay ce vin rouge italien intensment aromatique, car il n'offre pas le caractre robuste et muscl excessif des autres amarones connus. Il rvle un bouquet aux armes bien dfinis de cassis, de cerise sche, de tabac, de rsine et de rglisse noire. Il est d'une intensit et d'une lgance qui lui permettent d'tre savour ds maintenant. boire entre 2014 et 2020.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Amarone della Valpolicella Villa Arvedi Bertani

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The 2010 Amarone della Valpolicella Valpantena Villa Arvedi seems engineered for Amarone-curious consumers who may not be familiar with this intensly aromatic Italian red wine. The wine doesn't offer the exaggerated bulk and muscle of other well-known brands. Instead, it presents a focused bouquet with elements of cassis, dried cherry, tobacco, resin and black licorice. It reaches a state of elegant intensity that is also suitable for near-term consumption. Drink 2014-2020.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: The Hess Collection 19 Block Mountain Cuvée 2015

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin qui assemble le malbec avec le cabernet sauvignon et la syrah rvle beaucoup de profondeur, de concentration et de structure, ainsi qu'une acidit clatante. Les armes et saveurs trs robustes de cassis, de cerise et de confiture de bleuets sont agrments de notes de chocolat au lait sur la longue finale polie. Dlicieux avec les steaks marins.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 19 Block Mountain Cuvée The Hess Collection

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This wine blends Malbec with Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah and shows its mountain-grown origins in its impressive depth, concentration and structure as well as its bright acidity. Massively robust aromas and flavours of cassis, cherry and blueberry preserves and milk chocolate delight on the way to a long, polished finish. Pour with marinated steaks.

A Chianti Classico with balance and beauty plus dried berry, spice and meat. Full body, silky tannins and a citrus berry undertone. Quality Chianti Classico. Drink or hold.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Caparzo La Casa Brunello di Montalcino 2010

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le Brunello di Montalcino Vigna la Casa Caparzo 2010 est un vin sombre et intense la robe grenat presque noire. Il est musculeux et puissant et son bouquet dploie une vaste palette d'armes, dont la cerise sche, les pices, le cuir, le tabac, la rglisse et le goudron. Il prtend une grande complexit et une forte intensit et c'est exactement ce qu'il accomplit. En bouche, il rvle des tanins parfaitement assagis et une texture soyeuse. Les saveurs persistent pendant plusieurs minutes. Ce vin montrera ses plus belles qualits pendant encore une quinzaine d'annes.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Brunello di Montalcino La Casa Caparzo

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Caparzo's 2010 Brunello di Montalcino Vigna la Casa opens to dark intensity with blackish-garnet undertones. The wine exhibits muscle and power with a large array of aromatic qualities that include dried cherry, spice, leather, tobacco, licorice and tar. It aspires to high complexity and intensity and it delivers on that promise. In the mouth, it shows beautifully tame tannins and a silky texture. Brunello Vigna la Casa lasts many long minutes on the palate. The wine should hold steadily over the next 15 years.

Bouquet de framboise sauvage, de cerise, d'orange sanguine et d'encens agrment d'un soupon de tapis forestier. La vive acidit met en valeur les notes releves de grenade et de prune juteuse. boire d'ici 2025 avec les viandes froides italiennes ou le risotto aux truffes noires et au fromage asiago.

Wild raspberry, cherry, blood orange, incense and a touch of forest floor aromas. Bright acidity brings lifted pomegranate and juicy plum. Drink now through 2025 with salumi and cheeses or an Asiago and black-truffle risotto.

Ce cabernet sauvignon toscan colossal est dj minemment buvable. Les nuances fruites sont agrmentes d'un soupon de sucre brl et de cdre sur la bouche qui commence s'asscher. Charmant, d'une belle maturit et charg de personnalit. la fois juteuse et oxydative, la bouche est inusite, mais pas du tout dsagrable. Un vin envotant et particulirement complexe pour le prix. Dlicieux avec le confit de canard.

A big Tuscan cabernet highly drinkable right now. A little burnt sugar and cedar enhances the fruit on the palate which is beginning to dry out. A charming, mature find still with a good deal of personality. Both juicy and oxidative, a somewhat odd sensation on the palate but not unwelcome. Compelling and showing above average complexity for the price. Try with duck confit.

Originating in Portugal's Douro Valley, Port is the world's most renowned fortified wine. Luxurious and sweet flavours of red fruits, plums and strawberries, with full rich flavours and a fine balance. Ready to drink, this ruby Port pairs with chocolate-based desserts, berry pie, mature cheeses or pat.

Ready to drink, this ruby Port pairs with chocolate-based desserts, berry pie, mature cheeses or pat.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The 120 Reserva range commemorates the 120th anniversary of Via Santa Rita. Hand-harvested, and fermented at cool temperatures. Light, lively and refreshing on the palate, with flavours of gooseberry, peach, citrus and herbs. Serve with salads, grilled fish or vegetable soups.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Dark and tight, with a tremendous core of blackberry and boysenberry fruit, covered for now under dark chocolate, graphite and floral notes. Long, vivid finish has layers of fruit and a great minerally spine. Should be sleek and beautiful when it opens up fully. Best from 2007 through 2014.

Dark and tight, with a tremendous core of blackberry and boysenberry fruit, covered for now under dark chocolate, graphite and floral notes. Long, vivid finish has layers of fruit and a great minerally spine. Should be sleek and beautiful when it opens up fully. Best from 2007 through 2014.

labor avec du raisin provenant de divers vignobles de la province de Mendoza, le Quimera 2013 est un assemblage qui runit 50 % de malbec, 24 % de cabernet franc, 18 % de merlot et 8 % de cabernet sauvignon, et les proportions demeurent sensiblement les mmes d'un millsime l'autre. Le vin est lev en fts de chne franais neufs, mais en 2013, on a chang les dimensions des fts aprs avoir men une enqute interne la vinerie. En 2011, l'quipe de vinification a commenc faire des essais avec des fts de diffrentes grosseurs provenant de la mme tonnellerie. Aprs avoir lev du vin dans des gros et des petits fts, l'quipe a constat que les petits fts produisaient un fruit plus expressif, et a commenc utiliser des fts de chne de 160 litres. Je n'avais jamais entendu parler de ce concept, et d'ailleurs, Santiago Achaval m'a dit que l'exprience n'avait pas donn de meilleurs rsultats avec ses vins de la Californie. Aujourd'hui, la moiti des fts de la maison Achaval-Ferrer sont de 160 litres. Les fts durent jusqu' trois ans, et Santiago croit que c'est parce que les vins juteux de Mendoza requirent plus d'aration, et que le vin tire profit d'une plus grande surface de bois en raison de la trs grande quantit d'oxygne qu'il requiert. Le nez ne montre aucune trace de bois, et il est remarquablement floral. La bouche dote d'une acidit vive et de notes de fraise acides vous met l'eau la bouche et vous fait rver aux prochaines gorges. Tout simplement dlicieux. Le meilleur Quimera que j'ai dgust ce

Sourced from a diversity of places in the province of Mendoza, the 2013 Quimera is a blend of different red grapes, a mixture that is more or less constant across vintages, 50% Malbec, 24% Cabernet Franc, 18% Merlot, 8% Cabernet Sauvignon. The wine matures in brand new French oak barrels, but in 2013 the change is about the size of the barrels that was the result of an internal investigation they have been conducting in the winery. In 2011 they started experimenting with different sizes but from the same cooper. They bought larger and smaller barrels and they were surprised that smaller barrels gave more expressive fruit, so they started using 160-liter oak barrels. I had never heard this before, and in fact Santiago Achaval tells me this has not worked with his wines from California, but in Achaval-Ferrer half of the barrels are now 160-liter! The barrels work well up to three uses, and he thinks it's because the juicy wines from Mendoza have a stronger demand for aeration and the wine benefits from a higher ratio of wood-to-wine because of how much oxygen the wine demands. The nose has no trace of wood, and it's eminently floral. The palate has electric acidity, acid strawberries, it makes you salivate, makes you long for the next sip. Simply delicious. The best Quimera I've tasted. The wine will not be released until March 2016. 60,000 bottles were produced. Bottled in September 2014. Drink Date: 2016-2023

Made as it has been for centuries, from the finest quality ginger. Heady ginger aromas, followed on the palate by authentically spicy ginger flavour. The spicy bite is tempered by a balanced sweetness. Serve with spareribs, or craft an exhilarating gingery cocktail.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Apéritif à base de vin Wincarnis

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Wincarnis has a long history. It is a fortified wine, uniquely infused with a blend of herbs and spices. Aromas of brown sugar, molasses, caramel and herbs, followed on the palate with flavours of citrus rind, figs and caramel. Smooth and warming - sip on its own, or use in cocktails.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Apéritif à base de vin Wincarnis

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Wincarnis has a long history. It is a fortified wine, uniquely infused with a blend of herbs and spices. Aromas of brown sugar, molasses, caramel and herbs, followed on the palate with flavours of citrus rind, figs and caramel. Smooth and warming - sip on its own, or use in cocktails.

In the era when most wine was sold by the barrel, Periquita was Portugal's first bottled wine. Made with the easy-going castelao grape variety, this wine is dry and full-bodied, with raspberry flavours and fine balancing acidity. Moderate tannins provide structure on the finish. Pair with meat dishes, game or firm cheeses.

In the era when most wine was sold by the barrel, Periquita was Portugal's first bottled wine. Made with the easy-going castelao grape variety, this wine is dry and full-bodied, with raspberry flavours and fine balancing acidity. Moderate tannins provide structure on the finish. Pair with meat dishes, game or firm cheeses.

Grown on rocky hillside soils in the Stellenbosch region of South Africa. Attractive floral, pear and citrus aromas, followed after a first sip by crisp green apple and citrus flavours. The finish is lively and clean. Serve with grilled fish, seafood or salads.

Le Sauvignon Blanc Reserva 2007 rvle une robe paille ple et un bouquet aromatique d'agrumes, de citron-lime et d'herbes fraches. Rac et vif au palais, ce vin bien quilibr offre une finale vive et piquante. boire dans les 12 18 mois.

The 2007 Sauvignon Blanc Reserva is a light straw-colored wine with an aromatic array of citrus, lemon-lime, and fresh herbs. Racy and crisp on the palate, this well-balanced effort has a vibrant, tangy finish. Drink it over the next 12-18 months.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce rouge puissant rvle des saveurs concentres de prune rouge, de cerise et de mre de Boysen qui sont entrelaces d'abondantes notes d'pices riches et de minraux. Des nuances d'ardoise et de cardamome donnent de la complexit la finale. boire jusqu'en 2023. Fortement recommand. Class au 1er rang des 100 meilleurs vins de 2017 du Wine Spectator.

A powerful red, with concentrated flavors of red plum, cherry and boysenberry that are layered with plenty of rich spice and mineral accents. Touches of slate and cardamom make for a complex finish. Drink now through 2023. Highly Recommended. Ranked #1 in Wine Spectator's Top 100 Wines 2017.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: González Byass Nutty Solera Medium Oloroso Sherry

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Un mlange exquis de notes de fruits schs, de noix rtie, de miel, de caramel anglais, de moka, de truffe et de tapis forestier. Et il ne s'agit-l que du bouquet! La bouche demi-douce rvle des saveurs de girofle, d'huile de noix, d'espresso, de raisin sec et de zeste d'orange. Cet excellent xrs siroter comme tel au coin du feu est d'une allonge et d'une subtilit prodigieuses. Une fois ouvert, il durera plusieurs semaines, il suffit de lui remettre son bouchon. boire seul ou avec des fromages, des fruits et des noix.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Xérès Medium Oloroso Nutty Solera González Byass

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: An exquisite melange of dried fruits, roasted nuts, honey, toffee, mocha and truffly forest floor notes. And that's just the bouquet! On the palate it's medium sweet with clove, walnut oil, espresso, raisins and orange zest. Here's a lovely sipper of immense length and subtlety to enjoy by the fire as you welcome in the days of fall and winter. And it'll keep, with the cork back in, for weeks. Serve all by itself or with cheese, fruit and nuts.

Robe paille ple avec une mousse fine; nez lgrement malt; saveurs maltes et finale nette.
Pale straw colour with a fine mousse; a light and malty nose; sweet malty flavours with a clean finish.

Pale straw colour with a fine mousse; a light and malty nose; sweet malty flavours with a clean finish.

Le L'Apparita 2014 a le potentiel de devenir un vin exquis, mais il lui faudra quelques annes tout le moins. Il tire profit d'une texture crmeuse et profonde que les autres 2014 de la gamme n'ont pas. Il devrait commencer tre accessible 10 ans d'ge. Priode de consommation : 2024 2039.

The 2014 L'Apparita has the potential to develop into an exquisite wine, although it will be at least a few years before that is evident, and has a level of creaminess and textural depth not found in the other 2014s in the range. But Apparita really needs to be at least 10 years old to start showing well. Drinking Window: 2024-2039.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Ruffino Chianti Classico Riserva Ducale Docg

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: A benchmark Tuscan wine, first released in 1927. Today, it is made with modern techniques, while still respecting the traditions of Chianti Classico. Cherry, plum, spice, and leather notes on the nose; dry, medium to full bodied, tart cherry and plum flavours with hints of cedar. Serve with osso buco or grilled steak.

Ruffino Chianti Classico Riserva Ducale Docg

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Pelee Island enjoys Canada's longest and warmest growing season, which allows grapes to achieve full ripeness. Medium garnet in colour, with flavours of red cherry, ripe plum, earth and spicy oak. Serve with planked salmon or mushroom risotto.

Pelee Island enjoys Canada's longest and warmest growing season, which allows grapes to achieve full ripeness. Medium garnet in colour, with flavours of red cherry, ripe plum, earth and spicy oak. Serve with planked salmon or mushroom risotto.

Foul au pied dans des cuves de fermentation ouvertes, puis pressur en panier et pass en fts de chne franais aux deux tiers de la fermentation, le vin est ensuite lev 18 mois dans ces mmes fts. Ce vin nergique et mi-cors qui en rsulte rvle une excellente robe et des saveurs de fruits frais gaines de notes de chocolat noir et d'pices. boire d'ici 2026.

Crushed and foot-stamped in open fermenters, then basket-pressed and taken to French oak two-thirds of the way through fermentation, thereafter spending 18 months in that oak. It is a lively medium-bodied wine, its excellent colour a testament to the fresh fruit flavours girdled with a sheen of dark chocolate and spice. Drink by: 2026.

Robe rubis moyen. Le Barolo Bricco Fiasco dvoile un bouquet ouvert et parfum, suivi de nuances de fruits rouges, de minraux et de tabac dans une bouche mi-corse corse, de structure et de longueur classiques. Il est un peu moins gnreux en bouche que le San Rocco, et ses armes et saveurs plus volus semblent indiquer qu'il approche la maturit. Il devrait quand mme tre succulent jusqu' 20 ans. boire aprs 2007.

Medium ruby. The Bricco Fiasco displays an open, perfumed nose followed by dark red fruit, mineral and tobacco nuances on a medium to full-bodied frame of classic structure and length. It is somewhat less generous on the palate than the San Rocco, and its more advanced aromas and flavors suggest it is also closer to maturity, although it should drink well to age 20. Drink after 2007.

Cet assemblage 55 % de cabernet sauvignon et 45 % de merlot est offert prix avantageux. Il est toujours dans sa prime jeunesse, comme on peut le constater aux reflets violacs de sa robe prune noire opaque et ses tanins perceptibles, mais presque entirement intgrs. Le bouquet merveilleusement complexe rvle des armes de tabac, de confiture de framboises, de noix de Grenoble grille et de muscade. La bouche corse et juteuse offre des saveurs nergiques de bleuets, de cerise et d'pices. conserver au cellier jusqu'en 2024 ou boire ds maintenant avec un steak grill mi-saignant.

A blend of 55% cabernet sauvignon/45% merlot, this is attractively priced. It's still in its youth, as indicated by the purple edges on the otherwise opaque black plum colour and the perceptible, almost fully integrated tannins. The nose is wonderfully complex with notes of tobacco, strawberry jam, toasted walnuts and nutmeg aromas. It's full bodied on the palate with juicy tang and flavours of blueberry, cherry, and spice. Keep in the cellar until 2024 or enjoy now with a medium-rare, grilled steak.

Ce sauvignon blanc puissant aux vives nuances de pamplemousse rose, de goyave et de jujube la pche est ponctu de notes de pin et de sauge. L'ensemble est soutenu par des saveurs de lies fines et crmeuses. Environ 20 % du vin est lev en fts de chne et en cuves de bton (moiti-moiti environ) et le reste est lev sur lie en cuves inox. Ce vin tropical, mr et affirm requiert des mets puissants, comme les recettes de fruits de mer trs releves ou les caris de lgumes.

Punchy pink grapefruit, guava, fuzzy peach gummies in this potent, pine/sage flecked sauvignon blanc, one lined with a fine lining of creamy lees. Approximately 20 percent of the wine spends time in oak and concrete (split about 50/50) while the remainder spends time on its lees in stainless steel. Tropical, ripe and assertive, this requires something equally potent to match: think fragrant seafood or veg curries.

clatante robe rubis. Au nez comme en bouche, nuances de petits fruits noirs, de noyau de cerise, de rglisse et de vanille agrmentes d'un soupon de chne. La bouche ample et charnue rvle une note poivre qui donne de la prcision la finale. Les tanins poussireux donnent du mordant la finale persistante et vanille. boire entre 2019 et 2023.

Vivid ruby. Oak-accented dark berries, cherry pit, licorice and vanilla on the nose and in the mouth. Broad and fleshy in style, with a peppery note adding back-end cut. Dusty tannins lend grip on the persistent finish, which features a repeating vanilla note. Drinking window:2019-2023.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin rouge de l'appellation Nemea est lgrement toff, ferme, opulent et tannique, mais sans trop de notes boises et d'une teneur en alcool qui rchauffe la bouche. La finale fait persister les tonalits d'herbes sauvages. Voici un vin de pays tout fait honnte, d'une forte personnalit et dot de beaucoup de profondeur et de complexit. J'aime son acidit juteuse et sa finale insistante.

Fullish, firm, plush but also grippy red from Nemea here, perfectly mid-weight, with no obvious obtrusive wood, generous, palate-warming alcohol, and a lingering, wild herb-tinged finish. It comes across as a genuine, honest country red with lots of character, but also depth and complexity. I like the juicy acids and the lingering finish.

Issue de Quinta de Roriz, un vignoble qui surplombe le Douro, cette cuve est le second vin de la maison Chryseia. Il est structur et, comme tous les seconds vins, il sera probablement prt bien avant son grand frre. Le fruit dj tabli rvle des saveurs de fruits noirs mrs, des tanins fins et intgrs et une belle acidit en finale. Dgustez-le compter de 2021. Une slection pour le cellier.

From Quinta de Roriz, a vineyard high above the Douro, this is the second wine of Chryseia. It is structured but, as with all second wines, it is likely to be ready way before its elder sibling. The fruit is already finely in place giving ripe black flavors, fine integrated tannins and final acidity. Drink from 2021. Cellar Selection.

Il a fait chaud en 2016 dans le Niagara et on le devine bien au caractre souple, opulent et pic de ce vin non bois de la maison Flat Rock. Trs crmeux et lactique, il est dot de nuances de yogourt au citron et de lie, mais sans apport de chne. Un vin trs attrayant offert prix avantageux.

2016 was a warm year in Niagara and it shows in this soft and plush, ripe, unoaked wine from Flat Rock. It's notably creamy-lactic, lemon-yoghurt-driven, leesy without the oak. Appeal is wide and the price is right.

Ce vin particulirement frais et net pour le millsime rvle des armes et saveurs de petits fruits noirs, d'corce d'orange et de noix de Grenoble. Mi-cors et tanins fins. Prt boire.
A fresh and clean wine for the vintage with dark berry, orange peel and light walnut aromas and flavors. Medium body, fine tannins. Drink now.

Armes pics de fruits noirs. La bouche mi-corse rvle une texture complexe attribuable au maillage des tanins fins, du fruit et du chne. boire [d'ici] 2014.
Spicy, savoury black fruit aromas; medium-bodied, complex texture from fine tannins throughout interwoven with fruit and oak. Drink [until] 2014.

Robe claire, d'un vif jaune paille. Lgers armes de levure et de houblon. Lgre, avec une rafrachissante note d'agrumes en finale.

Carlsberg was founded in 1847 in Denmark and it is one of the country's widely exported beers. This pilsner is bright straw in colour with light yeasty, mild hops and citrus aromas and flavours. Light-bodied refreshingly crisp, this is a perfect match for Indian cuisine, lemon and pepper chicken wings or a veal sandwich.

Light-bodied refreshingly crisp, this is a perfect match for Indian cuisine, lemon and pepper chicken wings or a veal sandwich.

Robe or ambr trouble, mousse paisse et persistante; armes de banane, de zeste de citron et de fleurs d'oranger; bouche mi-corse et vive de caractre sec; saveurs d'agrumes schs et de fleurs; finale lgrement amre.
Cloudy, golden amber, thick persistent mousse; aromas of banana, lemon zest, orange blossom; dry, medium bodied, crisp, dried citrus and floral flavours, mildly bitter finish.

Billecart-Salmon is still owned by the original family who started the Champagne house in the 1800s. The house has 300 ha of vines under their control and owns around 15 ha themselves. They make around 2.5 million bottles of Champagne each year, including the stellar Brut Rserve label. A blend of the three traditional vintages, the result is a soft, elegant and focused sparkling wine on the palate with notes of yellow apple, brioche and lemon cream. Delicate yet racy, this is a joy to drink.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Wynns Coonawarra Estate Black Label Cabernet Sauvignon 2014

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Les riches saveurs de cerise noire mre, de compote de prunes et de pain d'pices agrmentes de notes de chocolat mi-amer, de sauge sche et d'un soupon de menthe verte sont soutenues par des tanins denses, mais opulents. L'ensemble mne une longue finale. boire d'ici 2030.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Cabernet Sauvignon Black Label Coonawarra Estate Wynns

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Dense but plush tannins frame rich, ripe black cherry, plum compote and gingerbread flavors, with bittersweet chocolate and dried sage notes and a whiff of spearmint. The focus carries through on the long, lingering finish. Drink now through 2030.

Robe cuivre moyen lgrement trouble; le nez dploie des armes de malt caramel, de gingembre, de pelure d'orange, de cannelle et de clou de girofle; bouche mi-corse modrment ptillante avec des saveurs de malt grill, de biscuit au gingembre et de gteau aux pices.

Clear, medium amber colour with moderate head; on the nose there is a medley of baking spices, such as ginger, cinnamon and clove, along with orange peel, rye bread, malt and nut; sweet, soft and rounded on the palate, flavours of cinnamon, gingersnaps, caramel and licorice, with a long, lightly malty but balanced finish.

Clear, medium amber colour with moderate head; on the nose there is a medley of baking spices, such as ginger, cinnamon and clove, along with orange peel, rye bread, malt and nut; sweet, soft and rounded on the palate, flavours of cinnamon, gingersnaps, caramel and licorice, with a long, lightly malty but balanced finish.

One of the beautiful aspects of Duckhorn's perennially delicious Sauvignon Blanc is its texture and structure. Richer and more oily than the majority of Sauvignons that are either tart or austere, the Duckhorn 2016 is a Sauvignon that will stand up to cream sauces and richer, more oily fish. This vintage is impeccably balanced, with impressive complexity and length, showing notes of citrus, tropical fruits and stone fruits.

Brewed in Ontario using the highest quality ingredients, this characteristically Canadian-style lager delivers a crisp finish that makes it easy to drink with no aftertaste. Pairs very well with all types of foods; try it with appetizers, pizza, creamy pasta, burgers or grilled steaks.

Chteau Bellevue de Tayac combines elegancy, finesse and purity typical of the Margaux appellation. Fruit-driven and pure, with a mix of mulberry, red currant and damson plum notes, laced with espresso-tinged toast and backed by light savory and iron hints on the finish. The wine drinks beautifully after three to four years aging and has a great cellaring potential

Chteau Bellevue de Tayac combines elegancy, finesse and purity typical of the Margaux appellation. Fruit-driven and pure, with a mix of mulberry, red currant and damson plum notes, laced with espresso-tinged toast and backed by light savory and iron hints on the finish. The wine drinks beautifully after three to four years aging and has a great cellaring potential

Deep ruby colour. On the nose, rich strawberry aromas intermixed with scents of blackcurrant and spices. Full-bodied with pleasant vinosity and medium-full, supple tannins. Long and pleasant finish. Can be enjoyed young thanks to its fruit and roundness.

Ce vin est le meilleur mritage de la clbre maison Tawse. labor avec du raisin vendang la main, il offre au nez des notes de cerise sche, de bleuet, de rglisse rouge, de framboise, de cassis, de terre et de minraux. La bouche ferme, mre, lgante et longue rvle de vives saveurs de fruits pourpres et de cassis, et des notes de terre et de minraux. Un vin costaud et merveilleusement impressionnant.

This represents the top Meritage from the renowned Tawse. Hand-harvested, this offers suggestions of dried cherries, blueberry, red licorice, raspberry, cassis, earth and mineral notes on the nose. The palate is firm, ripe, elegant and long, with lively purple fruit and more cassis, earth and mineral notes throughout. A robust and terrifically impressive wine.

Released just prior to my early November visit, the 2015 Hermitage Blanc features aromas of flamed orange zest (the wine is fermented in second-fill barriques, then ages in them for close to two years). It's full-bodied and rich, with a gorgeous silky texture, but it's also tight and firm, showing significant aging potential.

Released just prior to my early November visit, the 2015 Hermitage Blanc features aromas of flamed orange zest (the wine is fermented in second-fill barriques, then ages in them for close to two years). It's full-bodied and rich, with a gorgeous silky texture, but it's also tight and firm, showing significant aging potential.

Nez aromatique et captivant aux armes d'corce d'agrumes, de prune, de cdre et de ptale de rose. Bouche corse et fine aux tanins soyeux et la finale longue et attrayante. J'adore sa persistance et son intensit. Quelques nuances sales en fin de bouche. encaver pendant deux trois ans.

Very aromatic and exciting with citrus rind, plums, cedar and rose petals. Full body, fine and silky tannins and a long and beautiful finish. Love the persistence and intensity. Salty undertone at the end. Needs two to three years to open.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Glenfarclas 12-Year-Old Highland Single Malt Scotch Whisky

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Les doux armes de gteau et d'pices sont chaleureux et noisets. La bouche lgre et arienne rvle des notes gnreuses et clatantes de caramel sal, de crale et de noix. Son caractre est distinctement terreux et l'ensemble est travers par une note qui rappelle le champignon. Excellent et fortement recommand.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Single Malt des Highlands Glenfarclas 12 ans d'âge

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Sweet aromas of baked goods and spices are warm and nutty. Light and airy on the palate with plenty of bright and salty caramel, grain and nut flavors. Distinctly earthy with a mushroom-like flavor running throughout. Excellent, Highly Recommended.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: The Winery of Good Hope Reserve Pinot Noir 2016
PrimaryInformation.Description: 16 Winery Of Good Hope Pinot Noir

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin fait partir de raisins d'Elgin entirement ferments en grappes entires est semblable au Freedom (sauf qu'il a t lev 6 mois en fts de chne plus neutres). Frais, nergique et dot de nuances acidules de petits fruits noirs. Un excellent rapport qualit-prix. Il est suprieur d'un cran au 2012 que nous avons dgust prcdemment.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Pinot Noir Reserve The Winery of Good Hope

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: 100% whole-berry fermented from Elgin quite similar to Freedom (except only 6 months in older oak). Fresh and bright, with tangy black berry fruit. Great value. Step above last-tasted 2012.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Robe rubis. Bouquet de prune avec des notes de cuir, de goudron et d'anis. Un vin sec et peu tannique aux dlicates saveurs de petits fruits et de prune, l'acidit marque et la finale nette et courte.
Ruby red colour; plummy fruit nose with hints of leather, tar and anise; dry, with light berry and plummy fruit flavours with pronounced acidity and a clean, short finish; low tannins.
Robe rubis. Bouquet de prune avec des notes de cuir, de goudron et d'anis. Un vin sec et peu tannique aux dlicates saveurs de petits fruits et de prune, l'acidit marque et la finale nette et courte.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Louis Max Beaucharme Bourgogne Pinot Noir 2007

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le bouquet subtil rvle de beaux armes de petits fruits rouges avec des notes minrales et terreuses. Sec, mi-cors et vif, avec des saveurs de griotte, de groseille rouge et de champignon terreux. La finale est vive. Savourez ce pinot noir avec un risotto aux champignons ou un pot-au-feu.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Bourgogne Pinot Noir Louis Max Beaucharme

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The aromas are subtle, but there are red berry, mineral and earthy notes on the nose. It's dry, medium-bodied with lively acidity, with sour cherry, redcurrant and earthy mushroom flavours. It finishes crisp. Enjoy this Pinot with a mushroom risotto or pot-au-feu.

Un vin rond aux copieuses saveurs de cerise, de framboise et d'pices. Ce vin se dmarque tant par sa vive acidit que par ses tanins raffins. La finale rvle des notes fruites, pices et minrales. boire d'ici 2022. Un achat judicieux.

Offers a rounded profile, filled with cherry, raspberry and spice flavors. This is driven as much by the vivid acidity as the refined tannins, ending with elements of fruit, spice and mineral. Drink now through 2022. Smart Buys.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Rivera Il Falcone Riserva Castel del Monte 2012
PrimaryInformation.Description: (V)Riserva Il Falcone Castel Del Monte Docg(Rivera

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Un vin rouge clatant, harmonieux, mi-cors cors aux saveurs finement tisses de mre mre, de marjolaine sche et de cuir odorant soutenues par des tanins fins et releves de notes terreuses et minrales. Cette beaut s'panouira merveilleusement en carafe ou aprs un sjour au cellier. boire d'ici 2027.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Castel del Monte Il Falcone Riserva Rivera

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: A bright and harmonious red, set in a medium- to full-bodied frame, with fine-grained tannins supporting finely meshed layers of ripe mulberry, delicate dried marjoram and fragrant leather, revealing an undertow of fresh earth and mineral. A beauty that should open nicely in a decanter or with time in the cellar. Drink now through 2027.
PrimaryInformation.Description: (V)Riserva Il Falcone Castel Del Monte Docg(Rivera

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Drappier Brut Nature Pinot Noir Champagne

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce champagne sec est soutenu par une ferme acidit qui est cependant trs finement intgre dans les nuances de prune jaune, d'abricot, de biscuit, de fleur de sel et d'amande broye, donnant l'ensemble une belle dfinition, mais sans angles abrupts. La finale est comme de la dentelle. boire ds maintenant et d'ici 2020.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Champagne Pinot Noir Brut Nature André et Michel Drappier

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Firm acidity frames this dry version, yet it's finely integrated with a subtle range of yellow plum, apricot, biscuit, fleur de sel and crushed almond flavors, providing definition without hard angles. Ends with a lacy finish. Drink now through 2020.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Saveurs vives de poire, de lime, de figue et de mangue; longue finale terreuse releve d'un soupon de vanille imparti par l'levage sous chne franais.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Chardonnay Terroir Collection NO. 5 Lone Pine Mission Hill 2013

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Crisp pear, key lime, fig and mango flavours with an earthy, long finish and a kiss of vanilla from French oak.

Ce vin prim offre un agrable bouquet de bleuet, de cerise noire, d'orange sanguine et de garrigue (le parfum de fines herbes et de fleurs qui embaume l'air du sud de la France). Sec, il est dot d'un noyau fruit tendre et d'une intense finale d'pices et de cdre. Tout indiqu avec les ctelettes d'agneau grill ou les ptes riches.

Award-winning wine with a pretty nose, featuring aromas of blueberry, black cherry, blood orange and garrigue (fresh herb scent in the air in southern France). Dry with a sweet core of fruit followed by an intense spicy, cedary finish. Beautifully textured wine with a lingering, gently spicy finish. Try with grilled lamb chops or rich pasta dishes.

Dry with a sweet core of fruit followed by an intense spicy, cedary finish. Beautifully textured wine with a lingering, gently spicy finish. Try with grilled lamb chops or rich pasta dishes.

Cette vodka haut de gamme offre des saveurs uniques et une souplesse exceptionnelle. Elle est labore avec de l'alcool de grain de haute qualit, de l'eau de source naturelle purifie et des ingrdients naturels.

This elite vodka has, in the best traditions of classical vodkas, a special flavor and exceptional softness. It is made from high quality grain alcohol, 'Lux', purified natural crystal clear water, and natural components according to the classical production methods.

La texture polie porte des saveurs rserves, mais harmonieuses, de cerise noire, de rglisse, de fume et de goudron sur un fond minral un peu austre. Les tanins bien intgrs donnent l'ensemble de la structure, de la profondeur et de la prcision. boire ds maintenant et d'ici 2022.

A polished texture carries reserved but harmonious flavors of black cherry, licorice, smoke, tar and mineral in this rather austere red. Well-integrated tannins impart structure, giving this depth and focus. Drink now through 2022.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Cave Spring Blanc de Blancs Brut Sparkling
PrimaryInformation.Description: >Cave Spring Blanc De Blancs Brut Vqa

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce blanc de blancs bien dfini, lgant, raffin et nergique est agrment de quelques notes de grill. La bouche mi-corse offre toute la fracheur du chardonnay, qui tranche dans l'tonnante richesse de l'ensemble. Un vin bien quilibr, charmeur et raffin. Beaucoup de complexit pour le prix. Dgust nouveau en septembre 2017.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Blanc de Blancs Brut Cave Spring

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: A nicely defined, elegant and sophisticated blanc de blancs - vibrant and toasty. Mid-weight with the freshness of chardonnay that cuts the unexpected richness on the palate. Well-balanced, with both charm and refinement. Impressively complex at a steal of a price. Re-tasted September 2017.
PrimaryInformation.Description: >Cave Spring Blanc De Blancs Brut Vqa

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch Whisky

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Vive couleur laiton; saveurs lgres de caramel et de vanille avec des notes fumes, boises et pices; un scotch de style lger.

The distinctive and exuberant flavour of this dram was developed to be suitable for mixing in cocktails generations ago and is still a go-to for bartenders globally. Rich and vibrant aromatics with hints of clove and butterscotch; the palate initially sweet and spicy, develops a robust, smoky character with a warm finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch Whisky

Robe ambre ple; nez lgrement floral avec des notes de pche, de mas, de beurre et de vanille; saveur de pche lgrement sucre et boise; sec en finale.

Aging in both new and seasoned white oak barrels give Crown Royal its unique flavour profile that has garnered fans the world over. Light amber in colour the nose is lightly floral with corn, buttery/vanilla and peach aromas; on the palate look for light sweet peach flavour with wood spice on a dry finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Hunawihr Kuhlmann-Platz Vieilles Vignes Pinot Gris 2015

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Tir de vignes de plus de 20 ans d'ge cultives dans des sols calcaires, ce pinot gris d'une grande fracheur et de caractre presque demi-sec rvle des notes pices et des tonalits florales et fruites. Excellente sensation en bouche et bons rappels des nuances de pomme, de pche et d'agrumes du bouquet. Ce vin se boira trs bien seul, mais il fera aussi d'excellents accords avec le porc grill aux champignons.

Sourced from chalky vineyards and vines averaging more than 20 years of age, this fresh Pinot Gris toys with being off-dry and has spicy notes with floral and fruit tones. Excellent mouthfeel and texture with good replays of the apple, peach and citrus suggested by the nose. This will be a delightful sipper but also a fine match for grilled pork topped with mushrooms.

Brasse avec des fves de caf expresso torrfies. Cette bire est base sur la recette de la stout impriale adore par l'empereur de Russie. Bouche quilibre aux riches saveurs de caf.
Brewed using well-roasted espresso beans. The recipe is based on the imperial stout loved by the Russian emperor. Please enjoy the balance of its rich taste and coffee flavor.

Cette bire brun-roux est brasse avec du malt riche et du houblon amer. Elle offre un got bien quilibr. Servir 13 C.
A reddish brown beer brewed with a rich malt and bitter hops. Please enjoy the well-balanced flavour and taste. Serving Temperature: 13C.

Cette ale japonaise classique est base sur la toute premire bire japonaise qui date de l'poque d'Edo. leve en fts de cdre comme les vieilles IPA d'Angleterre, cette bire bien quilibre offre des saveurs de gingembre et de malt.

This Japanese classic ale is a re-creation of the first Japanese beer made in the Edo period. Aged in cedar barrels similar to the old IPA style method used in England, this beer is well balanced with flavours of ginger and malt.

Cette ale japonaise classique est base sur la toute premire bire japonaise qui date de l'poque d'Edo. leve en fts de cdre comme les vieilles IPA d'Angleterre, cette bire bien quilibre offre des saveurs de gingembre et de malt.

This Japanese classic ale is a re-creation of the first Japanese beer made in the Edo period. Aged in cedar barrels similar to the old IPA style method used in England, this beer is well balanced with flavours of ginger and malt.

Brewed using two Japanese original materials;"Kaneko Golden" ,the Japanese ancient barley, and "Sorachi Ace" ,the hop which once was bred in Japan. Please enjoy the citrus flavour, the golden color and the complex taste.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Jean Perrier & Fils Cuvée Réservée Roussette de Savoie 2009

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le cpage roussette prsent ici en version monocpage donne son nom une AOC en Savoie, une rgion alpine franaise aux frontires de la Suisse. La rgion est un lieu de villgiature trs couru en t comme en hiver et presque toute la production vinicole locale est bue sur place. Le vin que voici livre des parfums de pomme, de poire, de bergamote, de noisette et de rayon de miel. La bouche mi-corse, ronde, vive et de caractre sec offre des saveurs de pomme mre, avec des nuances de melon et une finale vive.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Roussette de Savoie Cuvée Réservée Jean Perrier & Fils

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The Roussette grape (showcased here as a 100% stand-alone varietal wine) lends its name to an AC in Savoie, the French alpine wine region that borders Switzerland. The area is so popular as a summer vacation spot, and for winter sport enthusiasts, that little of the wine produced here is seen outside the region. This example delivers aromas of apple, pear, bergamot tea, hazelnut and honeycomb. Dry, medium bodied and round with a crisp acidity, the palate offers ripe apple, hints of melon and a crisp finish. Enjoy with light shrimp dishes, or as an aperitif.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Jean Perrier & Fils Cuvée Réservée Roussette de Savoie 2009

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le cpage roussette prsent ici en version monocpage donne son nom une AOC en Savoie, une rgion alpine franaise aux frontires de la Suisse. La rgion est un lieu de villgiature trs couru en t comme en hiver et presque toute la production vinicole locale est bue sur place. Le vin que voici livre des parfums de pomme, de poire, de bergamote, de noisette et de rayon de miel. La bouche mi-corse, ronde, vive et de caractre sec offre des saveurs de pomme mre, avec des nuances de melon et une finale vive.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Roussette de Savoie Cuvée Réservée Jean Perrier & Fils

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The Roussette grape (showcased here as a 100% stand-alone varietal wine) lends its name to an AC in Savoie, the French alpine wine region that borders Switzerland. L'assemblage renferme 65 % de grenache, 20 % de syrah et 10 % de mourvdre. Le profond bouquet livre des parfums de poivre blanc, de graphite et de fruits rouges clatants. La bouche puissante et intense dploie des saveurs de cerise noire et de petits fruits noirs charnus sur un fond d'acidit vive et de tanins nets, rudes et lgrement salins. Longue finale aux saveurs de petits fruits et d'pices.

65% Grenache, 20% Syrah, 10% Mourvedre. Enjoys a deep nose with white pepper, graphite notes and bright red fruits. The palate is powerful and intense with black cherry and dark, muscular berry fruit, crisp acid and some neat, grippy, slightly salted tannins. The finish is long with berries and spice.

La maison Kubota ne doit jamais, et elle est trs fire de son sak Senju. Le nez laisse percevoir des nuances d'corce d'orange et un soupon d'agrumes. La bouche de caractre sec est nette. Ce sak est meilleur avec des mets que seul.

Kubota is a brand that never disappoints and their Senju does them proud. The nose and first tastes hint at light orange peel with just a twinge of citrus. The overall palate is dry and clean. This Sake works well with food and is less of a stand-alone sipping sake.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Dante Rivetti Barbaresco Bricco De Neueis Riserva 1997

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Un barbaresco typique. Armes exquis de fleurs, de prune, de rose et de minraux. Cors, tanins velouts et finale ferme et desschante.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Textbook-style Barbaresco. Lovely floral and beautiful plum, rose and mineral aromas. Full-bodied, with velvety tannins and a firm, mouth puckering finish.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Armes intenses de mre, de framboise et de violette. Mi-cors cors, tanins soyeux bien intgrs, finale exquise de minraux et de fruits. Mchu. Sec et cors.
Intense aromas of blackberries, raspberries and violets. Full- to medium-bodied, with well-integrated, silky tannins and a lovely mineral, fruit aftertaste. Chewy. Dry & Full Body.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Dante Rivetti Barbaresco Bricco De Riserva 1999

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Armes complexes de prune, de th, de petits fruits et de cdre. Cors et sec, tanins massifs et velouts, trs longue finale mchue. Un vin rouge la fois massif et quilibr. Excellent potentiel de garde.
Complex aromas of plums, tea, berries and cedar. Full-bodied and dry with big and velvety tannins and a long, long chewy finish. A big yet balanced red, with lots of aging potential.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Armes et saveurs de prune et d'pices. Mi-cors, saveurs de chocolat, de petits fruits et d'amande. Finale moyennement longue. Dj dlicieux, il sera difficile de ne pas le boire ds maintenant. Sec et cors.
Pretty plum and spice on the nose and palate. Medium-bodied, with chocolate, berry and almond flavours. Medium finish. Hard not to drink now, as it's delicious already. Dry and full body.

Ce brunello attrayant et de facture moderne rvle beaucoup de personnalit. Le bouquet dploie des armes magnifiques et affirms de petits fruits mrs, dont la fraise et la framboise abme, relevs de notes boises qui rappellent les noix et le cdre. La bouche complexe est tout simplement dlicieuse.

This is an attractive, modernist Brunello with lots of character. The nose boasts wonderful aromas of bold, ripe berries which include strawberry and bruised raspberry as well as some nutty cedar oak. The palate is complex and simply delicious.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: La Croix Montjoie Cremant De Bourgogne
PrimaryInformation.Description: La Croix Montjoie Cremant De Bourgogne

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: From 25 year old vines grown on clay/limestone soil, hand-harvested grapes, vinified using the mthode traditionelle and aged on lees for 18 months. Lemon gold colour with fine bubbles and a delightful balance of fruit and oak influences. Ideal as an apritif or with red-berry desserts - strawberry tarts or alongside a blackcurrant sorbet. Age-worthy for 3 years max.
PrimaryInformation.Description: La Croix Montjoie Cremant De Bourgogne

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Riche couleur brun acajou; armes herbacs complexes avec des notes de caramel et de noix; fruit modrment sucr, saveurs d'herbes et d'pices avec une pointe d'herbes amres qui dure jusqu'en finale.

A delicate blend of more than thirty herbs is part of this closely guarded recipe that dates back to 1894. Rich mahogany brown; complex herbal aroma with caramel and nutty notes; medium sweet fruit, herb and spice flavours with a bite of bitter herbs to finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Domaine Terlato & Chapoutier Lieu Dit Malakoff Shiraz 2011
PrimaryInformation.Description: #11 Shiraz Terlato Chapoutier Lieu Dit Malakoff

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: lanc, nergique et soutenu par une vive acidit, ce vin rouge d'une grande retenue dploie ses saveurs de prune, d'olive noire et de cuir sur une structure tannique ferme qui devient trs mlodieuse en finale. boire ds maintenant et d'ici 2018.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Shiraz lieu dit Malakoff Domaine Terlato & Chapoutier

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Sleek and lively with acidity, this red is restrained overall, spreading its flavors of plum, black olive and sweet leather over a fine-grained frame, lilting on the finish. Drink now through 2018.
PrimaryInformation.Description: #11 Shiraz Terlato Chapoutier Lieu Dit Malakoff

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Fonde durant l're Ansei (1854 1859), premire brasserie de sak Kato. La maison Meiri Shurui a cr la levure sak originale (M-310), qui confre au sak un bouquet exquis. Cette levure est aujourd'hui utilise partout au Japon. Ce sak offre un bouquet fruit et une bouche raffine et moelleuse qui en font un dlice.

Established in the Ansei era (1854~1859) by the First of Kato sake brewery. Meiri Shurui developed the original sake yeast, M-310, which produces an exquisite bouquet. It is now used by breweries nationwide across Japan. It's fruity aroma and refined smooth taste makes this sake truly regal.

Established in the Ansei era (1854~1859) by the First of Kato sake brewery. Meiri Shurui developed the original sake yeast, M-310, which produces an exquisite bouquet. It is now used by breweries nationwide across Japan. It's fruity aroma and refined smooth taste makes this sake truly regal.

Le Pintas Character 2015 est un vin de complantation qui runit plus de 30 cpages diffrents, mais surtout du touriga franca, du tinta roriz et du touriga nacional. Il a t lev 18 mois sous chne franais (50 % neuf) et titre 14 % d'alcool. Il n'avait pas t embouteill quand j'y ai got la premire fois, mais il est maintenant offert aux tats-Unis. Il est trs diffrent du Manoella (qui n'est pas labor avec des cpages infrieurs, mais provient simplement d'un terroir diffrent), et nettement meilleur ce stade. Le 2015 est un Character excellent, voire l'un des meilleurs vins du producteur ce jour. Il a la structure et l'intensit d'un vin haut de gamme, une profondeur immense et une finale massive et tannique. Il semble trs pur et limpide pour un vin de ce type. Il devra passer du temps en cave. Le fruit pourrait tre plus expressif, mais il devrait voluer avec le temps. Un vin trs prometteur offrant un bon rapport qualit-prix. Priode de consommation : 2019 2032.

The 2015 Pintas Character is a field blend (more than 30 different grapes but mostly Touriga Franca, Tinta Roriz and Touriga Nacional) aged for 18 months in 50% new French oak. It comes in at 14% alcohol. Not quite bottled when I first saw it, it is now in bottle and in the USA. It is a very different style than the regular Manoella this issue, its "second wine" competitor (however, this is not a selection of lesser grapes or barrels, just a different terroir), but a big step up as they both show today. This is a great "Character," one of the producer's best yet. It has the structure and intensity of an upper-level bottling, plenty of depth and a big, gripping finish. It seems fairly pure and transparent too, for a wine of this type. This still has some developmental questions to answer in the cellar. If it has an issue, it could use more expressive fruit. That may come in time. In the meanwhile, it is very promising and a fine value. Drink Date: 2019-2032.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Peller Family Vineyards Chard Bag In Box

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Chardonnay is the world's most popular white wine, known for its flavours of ripe apple and citrus. Smooth and medium-bodied, this wine has a hint of spicy oak, and a crisp, balanced finish. Serve with roast chicken, grilled vegetables or salads.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Peller Family Vineyards Chard Bag In Box
Peller Family Vineyards Chard Bag In Box

PrimaryInformation.Description: Peller Family Vineyards Chard Bag In Box

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Robe abricot ple aux reflets rose, mousse fine. Armes dlicats de brioche, de fraise anglaise et de fruits du verger. La bouche est dfinie par une mousse fine, une acidit race et un milieu de bouche toff aux notes de pamplemousse rose et de petits fruits rouges. Potentiel de garde : 8 ans et plus. Comprend 46 % de pinot noir, 45 % de chardonnay et 9 % de pinot meunier.

Pale apricot in colour; English rose with a fine bubble. Delicate brioche, English strawberry and orchard fruit on the nose. The palate is defined by a fine mousse, racy acidity, and a weighty mid palate with pink grapefruit and red berry characters. Ageing potential: 8+ years. 46% Pinot Noir, 45% Chardonnay, 9% Pinot Meunier.

L'une des superstars du millsime, cet assemblage runissant 80 % de merlot et 20 % de cabernet franc rvle des armes et des saveurs encore meilleurs que celles du Chteau Ptrus. Sa superbe robe rubis-pourpre opaque mne des armes de fleurs printanires, de framboise noire et de rglisse. Opulent, velout et cors, ce vin est d'une concentration blouissante, avec une acidit adquate et une longue finale. Vraiment, un vin excellent qui devrait tre dlicieux entre 2017 et 2032.

One of the superstars of the vintage, this blend of 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc smelled and tasted better than the great Petrus. A stunning opaque ruby/purple color is followed by aromas of spring flowers, black raspberries and licorice. This opulent, velvety textured, full-bodied wine possesses dazzling concentration, adequate acidity and a long finish. What a brilliant effort! It should drink well between 2017 and 2032.

Ce vin est tir de sols rocailleux composs d'argile limoneuse riche en calcaire sur un fond de schiste et de grs. Vives nuances de pomme, de litchi, de pche et d'pices agrmentes d'une superbe note d'eau de rose caractristique du gewrztraminer. Merveilleusement nergique et textur. Ce vin toujours spectaculaire est produit par l'une des meilleures maisons ontariennes.

This is sourced from stony soils with clay loam and rich limestone over shale and sandstone. It delivers crisp notes of apple, lychee, peach and spice with that great Gewrztraminer rosewater note. Excellent texture and vibrancy. Always a top-notch example from one of Ontario's best producers.

Robe ambre moyen; armes de caramel blond, de caramel, d'pices et de vanille; la bouche rvle des saveurs de caramel, de pain grill et d'pices.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Whisky Canadian Club Classic 12 ans d'âge

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Spending 12 years quietly mellowing in seasoned bourbon barrels gives this its robust and complex character. It pours a brilliant gold and offers a delicate nose of ripe banana, and dried fruit; the palate is rich and round with light spice, vanilla, and fruit character followed by a long, dry finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Segura Viudas Heredad Reserva Brut Rosé Cava 2010

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Cet adorable mousseux ros rvle de dlicieuses nuances tages de tarte aux pches, de fraise, de cerise rouge et de rosier. La bouche vive et clatante rvle une mousse nergique et une finale d'une grande vivacit. Excellent siroter lors d'un tte--tte ou servir avec des tacos au poisson.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Cava Rosé Brut Heredad Reserva Segura Viudas

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Layered and lovely pink fizz with delicious notions of peach pie, strawberry, red cherry and rosebush. Bright and vivacious in the mouth with a lively mousse and a tangy, crisp finish. A perfect sipper for intimate get-togethers, or pair with fish tacos.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Diana Lacrima Di Morro D'Alba DOC 2015
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 Diana - Lacrima Di Morro D'Alba Doc

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Robe rouge intense aux nuances pourpres. Notes de violette, de fruit de l'glantier et de mre. La bouche veloute rvle des nuances de petits fruits, de fraise sauvage et de ronce. Bonne structure et tanins fins. Finale longue et dlicieuse.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Lacrima di Morro d'Alba Diana Filodivino 2015

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Intense red with hints of purple. Notes of violets, rosehips and ripe black berries. The flavour is velvety with hints of berries, wild strawberries and bramble. It has good structure, with soft, fine tannins. The finish is long-lasting and delightful.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 Diana - Lacrima Di Morro D'Alba Doc

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Intense red with hints of purple. Notes of violets, rosehips and ripe black berries. The flavour is velvety with hints of berries, wild strawberries and bramble. It has good structure, with soft, fine tannins. The finish is long-lasting and delightful.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le Cabernet Sauvignon Kathryn Hall 2014 affiche une robe pourpre opaque, et dvoile des notes superbes de rglisse, de chocolat et d'expresso entrelaces de crme de cassis et de mre. Un bijou cors, puissant et remarquablement pur la longue finale, qui devrait tre sensationnel. Priode de consommation : 2017 2030 ou au-del.

The 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon Kathryn Hall has an opaque purple color, beautiful licorice, chocolate and espresso notes intermixed with creme de cassis and blackberry. This is a beauty, with full-bodied power, stunning purity and a long finish. It should turn out to be sensational. Drink 2017-2030+.

Soyeux et dlicieusement moelleux en bouche, ce baijiu de style classique offre des saveurs de banane et de riz grill harmonises avec finesse et arrondies d'un parfum d'anis trs nuanc. Il rvle en fin de bouche une note trs subtile de sauce soja.

A silky spirit with a deliciously soft mouthfeel, this classic baijiu exhibits delicately balanced flavours of banana and toasted rice rounded with a suggestion of aniseed on the nose. Finishes with the faintest touch of soy sauce.

Gorg de notes de cassis juteux et de mre du dbut la fin, ce vin rouge voque aussi la rglisse, les pices et le goudron. Dense et bien structur, il est dot d'un bon quilibre et d'une longue finale fruite et pice. son mieux entre 2016 et 2024.

Packed with juicy black currant and blackberry flavors from start to finish, this red also evokes licorice, spice and tar accents. Dense and well-structured, with fine balance and a long, fruit- and spice-filled finish. Best from 2016 through 2024.

Hailing from one of Niagara's top producers, this full-bodied white wine with lovely aromas of fresh peach wrapped in just the right amount toasty oak. Balanced and generous with green apple and hazelnut aromas. This is what cool-climate chardonnay is meant to be. Pair with corn dishes and roast chicken.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Cygnus Brt Nature Organic Cava (1 Plus 1 Equals 3)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Voici un vin mousseux de style champenois qui prsente deux avantages marquants pour le consommateur : il est issu de la culture biologique et il ne titre que 11,5 % d'alcool. Mais il y a bien d'autres raisons d'aimer le Cygnus vif et lectrique. Trs sec et lger, il rvle de vives nuances fruites de citron-lime soutenues par des notes de pain grill et un soupon de minralit.

Here's a fine, Champagne-style bubbly that comes with two bonuses where some consumers are concerned: It's organic; and it weighs in at an impressively low 11.5-per-cent alcohol. But those are hardly the only reasons to love this electric-crisp Cygnus. Absolutely bone-dry and light, it's got piercing, sour lemon-lime fruit underpinned by toasty bread and a suggestion of mineral.

Our Galan Sauvignon Blanc varietal possesses fruity and fresh flavours like melon and peach. Light to medium bodied. Serve with white meat, fish and pasta.

labor avec du raisin de qualit, ce vin dvoile des armes de petits fruits mrs et de prune, rehausss de nuances de violette et d'pices. Saveurs de prune noire et d'pices dans une bouche souple, structure et ample. Servez-le avec des darnes de saumon grilles, de la pizza au fromage de chvre avec pancetta, de la dinde, du poulet rti ou grill, de l'agneau, du boeuf ou des ptes.

This wine reflects the high grape quality with silky ripe berry and plumb character, accented with violet and spice nuances. Notes of dark plum and spice, with a soft and well structured mouth-filling texture. Imagine this wine with grilled salmon steaks or goat cheese pizza with pancetta. This versatile style is also great with roast or grilled turkey, chicken, lamb, beef, and pasta dishes.

Cette bire de bl acide aux pommes est dcouvrir. On ajoute les pommes durant la fermentation pour produire une bouche vive et acidule. Une bire dlicieusement complexe dont vous raffolerez.

Turn your beer-loving explorations toward a sampling of this apple-based sour wheat beer. Fruit is added during fermentation, which gives the brew a tart, vivacious character. Deliciously complex, it is sure to take your beer appreciation into new territory.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Robe incolore; nez poivr, avec un soupon d'agrumes; bouche trs ronde, poivre et lgrement douce.

The unique combination of traditional copper pot stills and modern distilling techniques create a classic vodka that has over 300 years of distilling heritage. Light peppery aromas and flavours are balanced with a hint of citrus; very round and unctuous on the palate with a clean finish.

Bernard-Massard Cuvée de l'Écusson Brut Rosé

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: La maison Bernard-Massard a t tablie en 1921 par Jean Bernard-Massard, qui a reu sa formation de vinificateur en Champagne. La Cuve de l'cusson faite entirement base de pinot noir rvle de gnreux armes de pomme rouge, de cerise Bing, de prune rouge, de framboise noire, d'agrumes et de grill. La bouche vive et nergique rvle elle aussi des notes de fruits rouges et de grill et des tanins bien prsents. Un vin d'une grande finesse.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Brut Rosé Cuvée de l'Écusson Bernard-Massard

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Bernard-Massard was established in 1921 by the Champagne-trained Jean Bernard-Massard. The Cuve de l'cusson is made of 100% Pinot Noir and has generous aromas of red apple, Bing cherries, red plum, dark raspberry, citrus and toast. Lively and crisp, it features more red fruit and toast on the palate, and some nice grip. Quite a finessed wine.

Un pinot gris frais et vif de Nouvelle-Zlande. La Nouvelle-Zlande est surtout reconnue pour le sauvignon blanc, mais son pinot gris est tout aussi rafrachissant et se porte trs bien dans les climats frais. Le Pinot Gris Kim Crawford 2017 offre des armes de lime, de poire asiatique et de citronnelle. Il sera dlicieux avec les fruits de mer, les coquillages et les crustacs. boire entre 2018 et 2020.

A fresh, crisp New Zealand white wine made from the Pinot Gris grape. We generally associate kiwi whites with Sauvignon Blanc, but Pinot Gris is equally refreshing and also does well in a cool climate. This 2017 Kim Crawford Pinot Gris offers aromas of lime, Asian pear and lemongrass. Pair with seafood, shellfish. Drink: 2018-2020.

Trapiche is Argentina's leading exporter of wine. This malbec shows a commitment to pure fruit flavours. In the glass, an opaque, deep ruby with purple hues. Expect aromas of plum, blackberry, cherry and spice. The palate is dry, finely textured and brimming with flavours of plum, blackberry and spice.

Expect aromas of plum, blackberry, cherry and spice. The palate is dry, finely textured and brimming with flavours of plum, blackberry and spice.

Des nuances de fraise et de rglisse s'entremlent avec des notes de petits fruits rouges et de cerise. La fusion des saveurs, des tanins et de l'acidit frache donne la bouche une texture ronde et moelleuse. Finale crmeuse.

Nuances of strawberry sweets and liquorish mingle playfully with red berries and cherries. The fusion of flavour, some tannins, and fresh acidity brings about a smooth and well-rounded texture which in turns leads to a creamy finish on the palate.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: San Pedro 1865 Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2015

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Les armes frais et anguleux de jalapeo, de poivron, de vent de plage et d'agrumes sont lgants, bien taills et puissants. L'acidit picote la langue et les saveurs d'orange, de tangerine et de lime sont releves de tonalits minrales. La finale pierreuse, clatante et pure confirme la grande qualit de l'ensemble. Le choix de la rdaction.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Sauvignon Blanc Vignoble unique 1865 San Pedro

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Fresh, angular aromas of jalapeo, bell pepper, beach breeze and citrus fruits are elegant, chiseled and potent. This tingles with acidity and tastes minerally, with orange, tangerine and lime flavors. A stony, bright, pure finish confirms its high quality. Editors' Choice.

Robe ambre vif avec des nuances oranges et une mousse paisse; armes d'abricot, de pelure d'orange et de fleurs; bouche de caractre sec trs houblonne avec saveurs de zeste d'orange, d'ananas rti et de rsine de pin.

Bright amber with a distinct orange hue and thick, foamy head; aromas of apricot, orange peel and lush floral notes; on the palate it is dry and aggressively hopped with flavours of orange zest, roasted pineapple and pine resin.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Torres Cordillera de los Andes Reserva Especial Carmenère 2010

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce carignan dborde de notes de terre, de prune et de petits fruits sucrs. Il est quilibr et suffisamment structur pour une garde de 3 ou 4 ans, mais pourquoi attendre? Il est dj trs bon. Savourer avec un braciole de boeuf farci aux saucisses et au cassis.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Carmenère Reserva Especial Cordillera de los Andes Torres

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Plenty of earthy notes, plum, and sweet-ripe berry fruit in this Carignan. It's balanced and structured enough to support another 3-4 years worth of cellaring, but there's no need - it's great now. Enjoy with beef braciole stuffed with sausage and currants.

Distill partir de muscat de Hambourg, ce tsipouro traditionnel est labor sans anis, ce qui donne libre cours ses armes de rose, de caramel et de beurre. Pour un spiritueux qui titre 40 % d'alcool, il est tonnamment souple et fruit en bouche.

Distilled from black Muscat grapes, this traditional Tsipouro is made without the common additive of anise, allowing the aromas of rose blossom, caramel and butter to shine through. For a spirit that runs 40% it is surprisingly soft and fruity on the palate.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Elk Cove Clay Court Pinot Noir 2014
PrimaryInformation.Description: #14 Pinot Noir Clay Court (Elk Cove Vyds)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Vin de rve parmi les cuves de vignoble unique de la vinerie, ce pinot noir costaud livre des saveurs de cerise mchue et des nuances d'agrumes sur un fond de pierre mouille et d'argile. D'une texture envotante, il devrait vieillir en beaut jusqu'en 2024.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Pinot Noir Clay Court Elk Cove

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: A standout among the winery's single-vineyard selections, this big-boned effort brings flavors of chewy cherry alongside a citrus highlight and a definite underpinning of wet stone and clay. Texturally compelling, it should age gracefully through 2024.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: labor avec du raisin cultiv dans la Valle centrale du Chili, ce sauvignon blanc dvoile des notes vives de melon miel, de fruits tropicaux, d'agrumes et de poire. De dlicates nuances de minraux, de citronnelle et d'pices donnent de la complexit aux saveurs de fruits frais. Bien quilibr, acidit clatante et texture riche impartie par l'levage sur les lies.

This Sauvignon Blanc has vibrant honeydew melon, tropical fruit, citrus and pear notes from grapes grown in the Chilean central Valley. Delicate accents of mineral, lemongrass and spice add complexity to the fresh fruit flavors.Well balanced with a good combination of bright acidity and a rich texture from aging on the lees.

De dlicates nuances de minraux, de citronnelle et d'pices donnent de la complexit aux saveurs de fruits frais. Bien quilibr, acidit clatante et texture riche impartie par l'levage sur les lies.

This Sauvignon Blanc has vibrant honeydew melon, tropical fruit, citrus and pear notes from grapes grown in the Chilean central Valley. Delicate accents of mineral, lemongrass and spice add complexity to the fresh fruit flavors.Well balanced with a good combination of bright acidity and a rich texture from aging on the lees.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Queen Of The Islands Arroz Doce Licor

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Made in Sao Miguel, Azores this rice pudding cream liqueur blends alcohol with fresh dairy cream and rice. Prepared in a very particular way that surprisingly reminds you of a very typical homemade Portuguese dish. Refrigerate after opening. Serve chilled or on ice, sprinkled with cinnamon.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Tabarrini Colle alle Macchie Montefalco Sagrantino 2012

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce rouge exquis propose un mariage de puissance et d'lgance, et rvle des saveurs tages de framboise noire crase, d'herbes de Provence, de moka et d'pices moulues, tayes par des tanins denses et mrs. La bouche est corse, longue et crmeuse, et rvle des nuances d'pices et de minraux sur la finale persistante. son mieux entre 2020 et 2032. Production de 175 caisses.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Montefalco Sagrantino Colle alle Macchie Tabarrini

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This lovely red shows a stallion's marriage of power and grace, layering flavors of crushed black raspberry, herbes de Provence, mocha and ground spice with dense, ripe tannins. Full-bodied, this is long and creamy, echoing more spice and mineral accents on the lasting finish. Best from 2020 through 2032. 175 cases made.

Ce vin de facture relativement moderne offert prix plutt abordable plaira aux amateurs de pinots noirs du Nouveau Monde qui nourrissent une certaine curiosit pour les vins de la Bourgogne. Les nuances clatantes et mres de cerise rouge sont agrmentes de notes de sous-bois, de fume, de terre et d'pices ainsi que d'une note minrale argileuse. L'acidit est superbe et les tanins donnent une belle structure l'ensemble, mais sans tre excessifs. Un vin juteux, complexe et accessible. Dlicieux avec le saumon ou le poulet grill.

This is crafted with a bit of an eye toward a more modern style, which (along with the relatively affordable price point) will make it an attractive wine for fans of New World Pinot who are curious about exploring Burgundy. Bright, ripe red cherry rides atop underbrush, smoke, earth, spice and a clay-tinged mineral note. The acidity is great, and the tannins provide structure but do not overwhelm. A juicy, complex, approachable wine. Try with grilled salmon or grilled chicken.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: lev 12 mois sous chne franais (25 % de tonneaux neufs) et amricain (10 % de tonneaux neufs), ce vin la robe clatante tmoigne du talent et de l'exprience considrables de l'quipe de vinification de la maison Penfolds. Tir du fruit de cinq rgions trs diffrentes (Wrattonbully, Coonawarra, Padthaway, McLaren Vale et Barossa Valley), il a t lev dans un mlange de fts tout fait remarquable. Le bouquet est particulirement convaincant, tout comme les nuances varitales du cabernet sauvignon sur la bouche mi-corse, longue et puissante soutenues par les magnifiques tanins de la varit. boire d'ici 2035.

Matured for 12 months in French (25% new) and American(10% new) hogsheads. Bright colour; a testament to the formidable skills and experience of the Penfolds winemaking team: five very different regions (Wrattonbully, Coonawarra, Padthaway, McLaren Vale and Barossa Valley) and a Magimix assembly of oak treatments. The bouquet is utterly convincing, as is the genetic expression of cabernet sauvignon on the long, powerful, medium-bodied palate - which brings with it a silver platter of cabernet tannins. Drink By: 2035.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Assemblage classique de Provence comprenant 50 % de syrah, 40 % de cabernet sauvignon et 10 % de grenache, le Coteaux-d'Aix-en-Provence 2015 voque un bordeaux qu'on aurait mlang avec un vin du Rhne mridional! Il fait jaillir du verre des armes de cuir de selle, de crayon de plomb, de cassis et d'pices. Un vin cors, riche et ample en bouche qui dborde de charme et de caractre. Il devrait durer de 8 10 ans. Priode de consommation : 2016 2026.

Made from a classic Provence blend of 50% Syrah, 40% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Grenache, the 2015 Coteaux d'Aix En Provence tastes like a Bordeaux blended with a Southern Rhone! Saddle leather, lead pencil, currants and spice all emerge from this full-bodied, rich, mouth-filling beauty that offers tons of charm and character. It will keep for 8-10 years. Drink Date: 2016-2026.

Le houblon Saaz dfinit le profil gustatif de cette pilsen. Robe or moyen, mousse assez paisse et armes de grain et de pelouse. En bouche, cette bire mi-corse et modrment effervescente dploie des saveurs de pte frache, d'agrumes et de pelouse. Finale vive.

Saaz hops influence this pilsners flavour profile. It pours a medium gold with a medium head; aromas of grain and grassy. On the palate, it is medium bodied and average carbonation with flavours of fresh dough, citrus and grass followed by a crisp finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Cono Sur Viento Mar Block 21 Single Vineyard Pinot Noir 2015

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le Pinot Noir Viento Mar Block No 21 2015 est un vin de vignoble unique tir de la parcelle numro 21 de la maison, situe dans un endroit venteux de la rgion de San Antonio Valley, le secteur de La Palma, d'o le nom de ce vin (viento mar signifiant vent de mer ). Le millsime 2015 a connu une rcolte htive et des rendements faibles. Les vignes de 11 ans d'ge sont cultives dans des sols de granite renfermant un fort pourcentage d'argile rouge. Le raisin rcolt la main entre le 7 et le 10 avril a t grapp, mais pas pressur, macr froid et ferment dans des cuves ouvertes avec des levures neutres. Le vin a t lev 12 mois moiti-moiti dans des fts de chne franais et ayant dj servi une fois. Bouquet de griotte et d'pices exotiques. La bouche juteuse rvle une grande fracheur granitique. Accessible et agrable. Production totale : 60 000 bouteilles. Priode de consommation : 2017 2020.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Pinot Noir Viento Mar Block No 21 Vignoble unique Cono Sur

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The 2015 Single Vineyard Pinot Noir Block 21 Viento Mar is produced with grapes from their plot number 21 in the windier part of San Antonio Valley, the la Palma sector, hence the name (Viento Mar means "sea wind"). 2015 was an early harvest with lower yields. The vines were 11 years old and were planted on granite soils with a significant amount of red clay. The grapes were hand-picked between April 7th and 10th, destemmed but uncrushed, put through a cold soak and fermented in open tanks with neutral yeasts. The wine aged in 50/50 new and second use French oak barrels for 12 months. There are aromas of sour cherries and exotic spices. The palate is juicy and with the granite freshness quite marked. Approachable and pleasant. 60,000 bottles produced. Drink Date: 2017-2020.

Ce charmant shiraz d'Australie-Mridionale dploie des armes de mre mre et de prune noire releve de notes de rglisse et de bonbon. La bouche corse et joufflue offre des saveurs de mre mre, de chocolat noir et d'pices soutenues par des tanins souples et velouts.

This charming South Australian Shiraz boasts aromas of ripe blackberry and dark plum, followed by some liquorice and confectionary notes. Full-bodied and possessing a plump texture, the palate delivers juicy flavours of ripe blackberry, dark chocolate and spice enrobed in soft velvety tannins.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: 2027 Cellars Wismer Vineyard Fox Croft Block Chardonnay 2016
PrimaryInformation.Description: 17 Fox Croft Block Chard Wismer Vyd (2027 Cellars)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Parce que le millsime a t particulirement chaud, seulement 10 % de ce vin a t lev en fts de chne neufs. Le bouquet trs expressif rvle des armes de pomme verte et de poire et un soupon de chne et d'agrumes sur un fond minral. La bouche agrablement texture, magnifiquement quilibre et d'une grande tenue dploie d'clatantes saveurs de fruits du verger, de tarte mousseline au citron, d'pices qui mnent une finale nette, nergique et minrale. Un vin fabuleux.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Chardonnay Fox Croft Block Wismer Vineyard 2027 Cellars

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Only 10% of the oak aging is conducted in new barrels for this Chard due to the hot vintage. It has a highly expressive nose of green apple, mineral, pear, subtle oak and a touch of citrus. It has lovely texture on the palate, beautiful balance and poise, with bright orchard fruits, lemon chiffon, seamless spice, swirling minerals and a clean vibrant finish. Fabulous wine.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 17 Fox Croft Block Chard Wismer Vyd (2027 Cellars)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Voici un merlot mr et exubrant dot d'une bouche riche et nergique. Nuances concentres de fruits rouges, avec un soupon de rhubarbe et quelques notes de cerise sche. Notes de cacao, d'espresso et de vanille. Cors. Grill. Le vin de la semaine.

A ripe, showy merlot with a rich, vibrant mouth-feel. Concentrated red fruit, with a hint of rhubarb and some dry cherries. Notes of cocoa, espresso and vanilla. Full-bodied. Toasty. Wine of the Week.
