Robe or ple; armes de crales et de pain grill; bouche lgre de caractre sec; saveurs de crales et de pain grill avec lgre effervescence; finale de longueur moyenne.

American style lager that's easy to enjoy. Pours a pale golden colour with fine head. Aromas of cereal, toast and cracker with light hops and corn notes.The palate is dry and light bodied, showing pleasant flavours of toasted grain, pale malt, light creamed corn, fruit, cereal and toast with grassy, herbal hops on finish.

Les rieslings du monde entier sont toujours compars aux versions allemandes, comme celui-ci, qui prsente une structure minrale ferme et un excellent quilibre entre la douceur et l'acidit. Un vin trs lgant qui est succulent avec la viande blanche.

Rieslings around the world are measured against German standards. A great example of why is found here, with its firm mineral structure and deft balance of sweetness and acidity. It's the picture of elegance and a sure bet to share alongside white meat mains.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: SanMichele Ai Pianoni Riesling Oltrepò Pavese DOC 2015

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le nez dvoile immdiatement toute une palette d'armes floraux et fruits, notamment de pomme Golden Delicious, de pamplemousse et de poire, et un soupon d'hydrocarbure typique du riesling. La bouche ample, harmonieuse et minrale est frache, savoureuse et bien quilibre. 13 % alcool. Oltrepo Pavese, Italie.

The nose immediately transmits a wide and varied range of floral and fruity scents, from golden apple to grapefruit, from pear to a slight hint of hydrocarbons, typical of the riesling. Amplitude, olfactory harmony and good minerality that is found in the mouth where you can also perceive freshness, excellent flavour, a good balance. 13% Alc/vol. Oltrepo Pavese, Italy

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Manoir de la Tete Rouge Bagatelle 2016
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016 Manoir De La Tete Rouge Bagatelle

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Chalky, wet stone minerality shines on the mid palate. The nose is intense with red and black fruit. Purple in colour, this charming red wine is characterized with notes of currant. On the palate, there is very little tannin but with a medium high pronounced intensity. Best served slightly chilled as it will pair well with white and red meats. There is great potential for the Bagatelle.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016 Manoir De La Tete Rouge Bagatelle

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Cette liqueur frache et subtile est distille en France et certifie biologique. Exhibant une belle robe aux reflets pourpres intenses, elle dvoile un nez riche et vif de fruits noirs et de prune. L'expression en bouche est tout aussi nette, fidle, exquise et gourmande.

A subtle and fresh, fully organic certified liqueur made in France, certified in organic farming throughout the process. Pretty colour, intense, with purplish reflections. The nose is rich, on black fruits and plum, full of vitality. On the palate the expression is just as clear, faithful, exquisite and greedy.

This American-style India pale ale has medium-high hop bitterness, on a balanced and medium weight palate. It is fragrant with floral, and citrus-like, piney/resinous aromas and flavour making ideal for food matching.

Cette vodka est distille trois fois. Elle rvle des armes de sorgum et des saveurs nettes.
This vodka is triple distilled to produce a clean taste with a clear sorghum aroma.

Dark garnet in colour, this wine smells of juniper berries, and raspberries and loamy soil. In the mouth the wine has an incredible salty mineral tang to it as redcurrant, raspberry and cherry flavours vibrate with electric acidity. Utterly,fantastically outstanding.

Dark garnet in colour, this wine smells of forest floor, raspberries and wet earth. In the mouth deep raspberry and wet earth flavours are scented with dried flowers and a bright mixed citrus zest aroma. Fantastic acidity and athletic tannins drive redcurrant tanginess through a long, earthy finish.

In the mouth deep raspberry and wet earth flavours are scented with dried flowers and a bright mixed citrus zest aroma. Fantastic acidity and athletic tannins drive redcurrant tanginess through a long, earthy finish.

Light yellow gold in the glass, this barrel sample smells of lemon oil, bee pollen, and wet stones with a hint of struck match. In the mouth, lovely lemon and golden apples mix with exotic citrus and wet stones. A blend of Grner Veltliner and Chardonnay.

Light yellow-gold in the glass, with aromas of chamomile and wet stones, fennel pollen, and lemon oil. In the mouth, electric neon lemon oil shimmers and crackles on the palate with fantastic minerality and great length. Lemon pith, wet stones, and chamomile linger in the finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Luciano Arduini Amarone di Valpolicella Classico 2011

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: L'Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Luciano Arduini 2011 (lev 12 mois en barriques et 18 mois supplmentaires en grands fts [botte grande] est un vin de facture classique aux copieuses nuances de petits fruits agrmentes de notes de prune mre, d'pices, de goudron, de sauce teriyaki et de cola. Les tonalits boises sont au premier plan, mais elles s'adouciront avec le temps. Ce vin boudeur, toff et trs mchu est soutenu par des tanins souples. Un amarone de millsime chaud qui montrera ses plus belles qualits pendant une dizaine d'annes.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Amarone di Valpolicella Classico Luciano Arduini

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Luciano Arduini's 2011 Amarone della Valpolicella Classico (aged 12 months in barrique and an additional 18 months in botte grande) shows classic lines with thick berry nuances backed by ripe plum, spice, tar, teriyaki sauce and dark cola. Oaky influences take center stage and should soften with more bottle aging. The wine is brooding and thick with soft tannins and a very chewy consistency. This warm vintage Amarone should hold steadily for the next ten years.

PrimaryInformation.Description: 12 Lagar De Robla Premium (Vinos De Arganza)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin rouge ferme montre de la rserve, mais aussi de la profondeur dans ses notes bien intgres de prune cuite, de rglisse, de minral et de fume qui s'entremlent sur un lit de tanins fondus. Finale juteuse. boire ds maintenant et d'ici 2022. Production totale : 35 000 caisses. Un achat judicieux.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Lagar de Robla Premium Viños de Arganza

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This firm red is reserved, but shows depth and integration, with mulled plum, licorice, mineral and smoke flavors that mingle over well-integrated tannins, giving way to the juicy finish. Drink now through 2022. 35,000 cases made. Smart Buys.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Bien que la rgion du Douro soit surtout connue pour ses portos, elle produit de spectaculaires vins de table rouges ces jours-ci, comme le magnifique exemple que voici. Les armes de violette broye, de prune poche et de gteau aux pices peine sorti du four mnent une bouche aux saveurs satures de fruits noirs noyau et de petits fruits broys, de chocolat noir, de pain d'pices, de datte, de pruneau, de caramel anglais et de craie traverses par des notes de framboise juteuse. Ce vin a mme un lien local : la maison Quadrus a t fonde par les Torontois Tony Amaro, Mario Amaro et Aristides Kaplanis en 2005. Ce vin rouge dlicieux accompagnera merveilleusement le confit de canard ou le faux-filet. Vos convives seront impressionns.

While the Douro is best known for producing Port, it's spinning out some spectacular red table wines these days - and this gorgeous offering is a case in point. Aromas of crushed violet, poached plum and freshly baked spice cake lead to saturated flavours of crushed dark stone and berry fruit, dark chocolate, gingerbread, dates, dried plums, toffee and chalk in an elegant tapestry of flavour shot through with a ripple of raspberry juiciness. The wine even has a local link: Quadrus was founded by Torontonians Tony Amaro, Mario Amaro and Aristides Kaplanis in 2005. Pour this delicious red with duck confit or striploin for dinner one night and stun your guests.

Since 1866 this aperitif has been popular among cocktail enthusiasts worldwide and was even considered a health tonic at one time. Pouring a medium garnet it is fragrant with notes of coffee, bitter orange, and red berry. The palate is dry with intense herbal, citrus, and berry flavours followed by a medium length finish.

clatante robe cuivre limpide et mousse paisse qui persiste longuement; le bouquet est malt et frais et la bouche crmeuse rvle des saveurs lgres de caf, de raisin sec et de prune; finale lgrement amre de persistance moyenne.

Kilkenny's brewing heritage dates back to 14th century and is a classic Irish ale. Pouring brilliant copper with a foamy white head that sustains for a good length of time; the nose is malty and fresh while the palate is creamy with light coffee, raisin, plum and light bitterness on a medium-length finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Herdade da Pimenta Touriga Nacional/Touriga Franca/Alicante Bouschet 2013

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Un long levage en fts de chne a donn ce vin concentr de la puissance et un grand potentiel de vieillissement. Pour le moment, il rvle une grande fermet tannique, mais les riches tonalits de fruits noirs et l'acidit juteuse sont enfouies et attendent d'merger. Il sera impressionnant aprs 2018. Le choix du rdacteur en chef.

Serious wood aging has given this concentrated wine power and great aging potential. For now, it is firmly tannic, but rich black fruit tones and juicy acidity are there, waiting to develop. It will be an impressive wine after 2018. Editors' Choice.

PrimaryInformation.Description: 16 Escolha Dos Enologos Sao Miguel (Alex Relvas)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin rouge archtypal d'Alentejo fait jaillir du verre des nuances de fruits noirs juteux. Gnreux, poli et au fruit affirm, ce vin de plaisir est puissant et opulent, mais sans lourdeur. Priode de consommation : 2017 2024.

An archetypal Alentejo red, with dark, juicy fruit jumping out of the glass. Generous, glossy and fruit-forward, therein lying the pleasure - powerful and opulent but not at all heavy. Drinking Window: 2017-2024.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Classic clear Grappa made exclusively from the pomace of Moscato grapes distilled in copper pots. Elegant, harmonious and well balanced. Soft aromas of fresh flowers and gentle spice are repeated on the palate as flavours with a long smooth finish.

Classic clear Grappa made exclusively from the pomace of Moscato grapes distilled in copper pots. Elegant, harmonious and well balanced. Soft aromas of fresh flowers and gentle spice are repeated on the palate as flavours with a long smooth finish.

Le bouquet d'une agrable complexit livre des parfums de prune noire, de cassis, de fleurs et de cdre relevs d'un soupon de cigare. La bouche est tout aussi attrayante avec ses saveurs fruites intenses soutenues par une texture soyeuse et des tanins fins et crayeux. Ce vin rvle beaucoup d'quilibre et de tenue, et il est promis un bel avenir. Un assemblage de merlot, de cabernet et de malbec. son mieux entre 2015 et 2022.

Lovely complexity on the nose - dark plum, cassis, floral, cedar and a hint of cigar. The palate is equally attractive with excellent fruit intensity, beautifully supported by silky texture and fine, chalky tannins. The wine shows wonderful balance and poise, and [is] destined to develop gracefully. A blend of merlot, cabernet and malbec. At its best: 2015 to 2022.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le vin exprime bien sa provenance des contreforts du mont Kasteelberg. la fois intense et dlicat, cors et vif, mais aussi serin, quilibr et harmonieux. lev exclusivement en vieux fts de chne.
The wine speaks of its origins on the Kasteelberg slopes. It's both intense & delicate, full of vivacity & also serene, balanced, harmonious. Only old oak.

Cet assemblage volu de style bordelais base de cabernet sauvignon dvoile des armes gnreux et complexes de cassis, de carvi, de graphite et de cuir, relevs de notes de viande qui voquent le foie. Ni lourd ni dense, il se montre trs vif et nergique et rvle des tanins fermes. Un vin sec et svelte de style europen qui offre un excellent rapport qualit-prix. Longueur remarquable.

This is a maturing Bordeaux-styled, cabernet based blend with quite generous and complex aromas of currants, caraway, graphite, leather and some liver/meaty notes. It is not a heavy, dense red - indeed there is considerable energy and vibrancy with firm tannin. Lots here for the money, in a quite Euro-lean, dry style. The length is excellent.

La vinerie Decoy tablie en 1985 est le pied--terre de la maison mythique Duckhorn dans le comt de Sonoma. Elle produit depuis 2008 ce merlot intense et opulent aux nuances tages de fleurs, de bleuet, de framboise, de cassis, de cacao et de fines herbes sches. Voici une expression complexe et classique d'une des meilleures maisons de la rgion. Ce vin polyvalent fera des accords dlicieux avec le carr d'agneau ou le riz au jambon fum et aux haricots noirs.

Established in 1985, Decoy is the Sonoma outpost of the iconic Napa winery Duckhorn. Decoy has been producing this Merlot since 2008. Intense and lush with layered floral, blueberry, raspberry, cassis, cocoa and dried herb notes. A complex, classic expression from one of the best. This has the versatility and flexibility for rack of lamb, or black beans and smoked ham on rice.

Ce vin toujours en dveloppement rvle de fines bulles qui collent aux parois du verre. Les armes d'pices, de fleurs et de litchi sont nergiques et la bouche de caractre sec rvle beaucoup de richesse et d'intensit. Un achat avantageux.
This wine is still settling in, with tiny bubbles coating the glass. The aromas of spice, flowers and lychee are vibrant and the palate drinks dry, showing plenty of richness and intensity. Best Buy.

Le Cabernet Sauvignon The Hedonist est tir des riches sols de loam et d'argile cultivs en biodynamie dans les vignobles du domaine, dans les contreforts de Willunga. Les vignes rafrachies par les brises ocaniques qui soufflent depuis le golfe de St. Vincent permettent de prserver l'acidit qui donne aux vins de la rgion leur fabuleux quilibre. Ce vin du millsime 2014 est frais et aux notes de fruits noirs mrs. Juteux et quelque peu tannique, il fera de dlicieuses harmonies avec les hamburgers, les steaks ou le rti de boeuf. (Comit Vintages, janv. 2016)

The Hedonist is sourced from rich loam and clay soils in a biodynamically farmed the estate vineyard in the Willunga foothills. The vines are cooled by ocean breezes from St. Vincent's Gulf, a key factor in the preservation of balance in the final wines. The 2014 Cabernet is crafted in a fresh style, with ripe black fruit notes. Juicy and with some grip, it will be a fine partner for burgers, steak or roast beef. (Vintages Panel, Jan. 2016)

Light, orange-tinged pink. Fresh red berries and cherry on the nose, with a hint of dusty minerals adding energy. Dry and faintly bitter, offering spicy red fruit and blood orange flavors and a touch of candied rose. Exquisite definition on the finish.

Orange peel, lemon curd and honeydew on the nose, with lively brightness. Juicy citrus & melon flavors balanced by a touch of floral honey and weight on the palate. Beautiful, rich and very drinkable.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Un vin rouge linaire et fin aux nuances de prune et de petits fruits. Bouche mi-corse et finale nergique. Nuances d'corce d'orange sche et intenses saveurs fruites. Agrables notes de cdre et de bois de santal. Prt boire.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Wild hops still grow on historic railway routes into Guelph, Ontario. Clear gold in colour, with a long-lasting head. Malty aromas are accompanied by the grapefruit, herbal, green tea and citrus notes of hops. Medium-bodied, with flavours of cereal, toffee and banana; balanced, with a creamy texture and lengthy finish.

Wild hops still grow on historic railway routes into Guelph, Ontario. Clear gold in colour, with a long-lasting head. Malty aromas are accompanied by the grapefruit, herbal, green tea and citrus notes of hops. Medium-bodied, with flavours of cereal, toffee and banana; balanced, with a creamy texture and lengthy finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Weller Antique 107 Original Wheated Straight Bourbon

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce bourbon m'a presque fait tomber la renverse. Dans le pass, je l'ai toujours trouv agrable, mais un peu insuffisant. Mais cette bouteille semble avoir t foudroye par plusieurs milliers de volts, car elle prend vie en bouche, o elle mle fracheur et maturit dbonnaire.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Bourbon Weller The Original Wheated Straight Antique 107

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This almost blew me off my chair. Always thought this was pleasant, if a little underwhelming, in the past. However, this bottling has had a few thousands volts passed through it as it now comes alive on the palate with a glorious blending of freshness and debonair aging.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Jean Fillioux Tres Vieux Grande Champagne 1er Cru de Cognac
PrimaryInformation.Description: #Tres Vieux Grand Champagne 1er Cru De Cognac

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: labor avec des cognacs de 25 ans d'ge minimum. Robe cuivre fascinante avec une quantit considrable de sdiments fins. Ds les premires bouffes, je dnote d'abondants parfums de nougat, de banane dans le sirop, d'rable et de clou de girofle; il livre ensuite des notes de beurre, d'pices de gteau de Nol (clou de girofle, cannelle) et de fruits jaunes schs, notamment de poire, d'ananas et de kiwi. L'attaque est profonde, acide, rsineuse et mme un peu mchue; le milieu de bouche voque le tabac, le fromage, les oeufs, le bacon et le grill. La finale satine, charnue, nette et sensuelle dvoile des notes de tabac cigare, de rsine et de chne. Meilleure recommandation.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Cognac Grande Champagne Jean Fillioux Très Vieux 1er Cru de Cognac

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Twenty-five years old minimum. Eye-catching copper color; again, substantial amounts of wispy sediment seen. I get lots of streamlined scents of nougat, banana in brown sugar syrup, some maple and clove in the initial inhalations after the pour; secondary sniffs detect butter, Christmas cake spices (clove, cinnamon) and dried yellow fruit, including pear, pineapple and kiwi. Entry is deep, acidic, resiny and even a tad chewy; midpalate is tobacco-like, cheese-like, eggy, bacon-like and toasty. Finishes satiny in texture, cigar tobacco-like, resiny/oaky, meaty, clean and, oh, so sensuous. Highest Recommendation.
PrimaryInformation.Description: #Tres Vieux Grand Champagne 1er Cru De Cognac

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Sho Chiku Bai Rei Junmai DaiGinjo Saké
PrimaryInformation.Description: Sho Chiku Bai Rei Junmai Daiginjo Sake

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: La fermentation basse temprature nous donne ici un sak d'une prsence et d'un quilibre exceptionnels. Vraiment moelleux ds le premier contact avec le palais, il prsente une clart aromatique et un got frais et vivifiant. Servez-le frais.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Saké Junmai DaiGinjo Sho Chiku Bai Rei

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Low-temperature fermentation produces a sake that exhibits exceptional balance and presence. Entirely smooth from the first point past the lips, it shows an aromatic clarity and fresh, bracing taste. Serve it chilled.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Straw yellow in colour. Persistent and fine perlage. Notes of white flowers and citrus fruit on the nose. Dry, sapid and persistent on the mouth..

Robe or ple; armes de crales et de pain grill; bouche lgre de caractre sec; saveurs de crales et de pain grill avec lgre effervescence; finale de longueur moyenne.

American style lager that's easy to enjoy. Pours a pale golden colour with fine head. Aromas of cereal, toast and cracker with light hops and corn notes.The palate is dry and light bodied, showing pleasant flavours of toasted grain, pale malt, light creamed corn, fruit, cereal and toast with grassy, herbal hops on finish.

Vinified with only native yeasts (and no SO2 is added) this has all the high-toned, crunchy mineral purity that typifies Poulsard. Expect smoky berries, blood orange, iron, and juicy red plum flavours. It is structured and tannic, making it a solid choice for charcuterie or heartier meats.

Rond, intense et lgant en bouche, ce riesling se distingue aussi par sa nettet, sa fracheur et sa salinit avant de se terminer sur une finale longue et aromatique. Impressionnant!

Le pays d'Homre nous apporte cet pique vin blanc sec de roditis vtu d'une robe citron ple et dot d'intenses armes de pamplemousse frais, de melon miel et de banane. Comme tous les bons exemples de vins faits partir de ce cpage, il rvle une acidit clatante et fait des accords heureux avec les poissons gras chair rouge, les crevettes grilles et les sushis.

From the land of Homer comes this epic dry white Roditis with a pale lemon tint and intense aromas of fresh grapefruit, honeydew melon and banana. Like all good examples of this grape, it shows vibrant acidity and makes an excellent pairing for red fatty fishes, grilled shrimp and sushi.

Robe or ple. Armes de pomme jaune et de pain grill, avec un soupon de houblon floral. La bouche est passablement corse et lgrement gazeuse, avec des saveurs d'agrumes frais et de biscuit accompagns d'une petite amertume de houblon.

Pale gold colour; aromas of yellow apples, toast and light floral hops; on the palate it is light-medium bodied and lightly carbonated, with flavours of fresh citrus, biscuit and light hop bitterness.

The Te Awa vineyards are situated on the famed Gimblett Gravels, one of the best growing sites in the Hawke's Bay region. This wine has pronounced aromas of passionfruit, lime, grapefruit, asparagus and jalapeno pepper. Vibrant and refreshingly dry, with lively acidity and medium body. Superb with grilled seafood.

Finalement, le Zinfandel Black Chicken 2014 (qui doit son nom au nom de code utilis pour commander une cruche de zinfandel durant la Prohibition) est un autre zinfandel relativement costaud qui titre 15,3 % d'alcool. Magnifiquement proportionn, textur et presque mchu, ce zinfandel tonnamment hdoniste, charnu et flamboyant livre d'abondantes notes de glycrine et de fruits. Dgustez-le au cours des 7 ou 8 prochaines annes.

Lastly, the 2014 Zinfandel Black Chicken (its name coming from the code name used when ordering a jug of Zinfandel during the Prohibition era) is another relatively big-boned Zinfandel at 15.3% alcohol. Gorgeously proportioned, textured and almost chewy, this stunningly hedonistic and fleshy, flamboyant Zinfandel delivers abundant glycerin, fruit, quality and personality. Drink it over the next 7-8 years.

Assemblage de cabernet sauvignon (61%), de shiraz (18 %), de merlot (11 %) et de petit verdot (10 %). La robe est attrayante, mais pas particulirement profonde. Le bouquet fragrant voque d'abord les saveurs de fruits complexes du cpage, puis le terroir. La bouche rvle des saveurs de fruits noirs et rouges entrelaces de notes de chne franais neuf et de tanins fins. Ce vin peut tre dgust ds maintenant ou encav long terme. Le bouchon de lige a donn du fil retordre au serveur lors de la dgustation. boire d'ici 2039. Un achat avantageux.

A 61/18/11/10% blend of cabernet sauvignon, shiraz, merlot and petit verdot. Good colour, although not especially deep; the bouquet is fragrant, speaking first about the complex fruit cepage, secondly about its place. Red and black fruits join in seamless union with new French oak and fine-grained tannins. A wine that can give pleasure now or in the far distant future. A diabolical cork fought to the end, leaving wreckage all over the tasting table. Drink By: 2039. Special Value.

PrimaryInformation.Description: 16 Pinot Noir Other People's Pinot(Nw Wine Company

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: L'acronyme O.P.P. signifie Other People's Pinot (le pinot des autres), mais vous pourriez bien avoir envie d'en faire le vtre. La maison Mouton Noir a t fonde par le sommelier devenu vinificateur Andr Hueston Mack, qui apporte la notion de vin de garage la viniculture de l'Oregon dans une atmosphre dtendue et naturelle. Ce vin aux attrayantes notes de cerise rouge, de betterave et de fume fera des accords superbes avec le porc effiloch ou les hamburgers vgtariens.

Who's down with O.P.P.? The initials here stand for "Other People's Pinot," but you're going to want to make this one your own. Mouton Noir was founded by sommelier-turned-winemaker Andr Hueston Mack, who brings a 'garagiste' philosophy to Oregon winemaking while keeping things fun and casual. The wine offers attractive red cherry, beetroot and smoke and will pair nicely with pulled pork or veggie burgers.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 16 Pinot Noir Other People's Pinot(Nw Wine Company

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: La maison Santa Margherita a plong dans l'univers du valpolicella avec son ripasso inaugural (2014) et elle a fait une entre vraiment trs remarque! Assemblage 40 % de corvina, 40 % de corvinone et 20 % de rondinella, ce vin a t repass sur les peaux de l'amarone en cours de vinification de la maison pour le soumettre une seconde fermentation pendant deux semaines avant de le mettre en fts pour un sjour de neuf mois. Vin sec aux notes succulentes et fruites de fruits noirs schs, de prune et d'pices gteaux au nez comme en bouche. Trs bien quilibr et soutenu par une acidit et une texture fraches, ce vin fera de superbes harmonies avec les riches risottos et ptes, les jarrets de veau braiss ou les fromages pte ferme vieillis. Il sera aussi particulirement dlicieux avec le chocolat noir aprs un grand repas.

Santa Margherita has jumped into the world of Valpolicella with their inaugural vintage (2014) Ripasso and did they ever succeed! A blend of 40% Corvina, 40% Corvinone, and 20% Rondinella, the wine was re-passed over the pomace of their not-yet released Amarone and allowed to ferment once again for two weeks before it was barrel aged for nine months prior to bottling. Dry with a great blend of savoury and fruity notes, the dried dark fruits, plum, and baking spices greet the the nose and palate. Very well balanced with fresh acidity and texture making it ideal with rich risotto and pasta dishes, braised veal shank, and aged firm cheese. Also great when enjoyed with dark chocolate after a rich meal.

A richly complex, golden-coloured wine, with aromas reminiscent of the honey and orange peel flavours traditional to this region. Full and sweet on the palate, revealing a good level of acidity that confers a certain freshness. A persistent, prolonged finish.

A richly complex, golden-coloured wine, with aromas reminiscent of the honey and orange peel flavours traditional to this region. Full and sweet on the palate, revealing a good level of acidity that confers a certain freshness. A persistent, prolonged finish.

The 2013 The August 1888 Sauvignon Blanc is all barrel-fermented and offers gorgeous peach, grapefruit and toast notes with hints of honeyed almonds, jasmine and elderflowers. The medium-bodied palate lends lovely texture, with great richness and length

The 2013 The August 1888 Sauvignon Blanc is all barrel-fermented and offers gorgeous peach, grapefruit and toast notes with hints of honeyed almonds, jasmine and elderflowers. The medium-bodied palate lends lovely texture, with great richness and length

Finishing in peated casks imparts a subtle note of peat smoke to this Welsh whisky. Top notes of vanilla, orange zest and seaside coastal notes are layered on a medium weight palate that culminates in a long finish that builds with fresh citrus followed by a hint of bitter pith-like flavour.

Finishing in peated casks imparts a subtle note of peat smoke to this Welsh whisky. Top notes of vanilla, orange zest and seaside coastal notes are layered on a medium weight palate that culminates in a long finish that builds with fresh citrus followed by a hint of bitter pith-like flavour.

a 50/50 blend of Listn negro and Vijariego grapes harvested from old vines planted in volcanic soil. Aged 9 months in French-oak barrels. A full-bodied wine, with complex dark fruit aromas of blackberry, Bing cherry, and plum with notes of cocoa, vanilla spice, and cinnamon.

a 50/50 blend of Listn negro and Vijariego grapes harvested from old vines planted in volcanic soil. Aged 9 months in French-oak barrels. A full-bodied wine, with complex dark fruit aromas of blackberry, Bing cherry, and plum with notes of cocoa, vanilla spice, and cinnamon.

Le Xrs Pedro Ximnez de aada 2014 la robe ambre fonce est doux et dot de notes de figue au miel, de sirop d'rable, de caramel anglais et de liqueur d'amandes. Il est riche, onctueux et trs cors : un lixir tout fait divin. Il devrait tenir la route pendant au moins 20 30 ans. boire entre 2016 et 2046.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Xérès Pedro Ximénez de Añada Alvear

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The 2014 Pedro Ximenez de Anada is dark amber and sweet, with notes of honeyed figs, maple syrup, toffee and almond liqueur. It is rich and unctuous, very full-bodied and a serious decadent elixir. It should last for 20-30 years, or more. Drink 2016-2046.

Dark colour, dense with bright highlights. Intense nose of black fruits, spice and roasted notes. The attack is wide and elegant, marked by ripe black fruit. The mid-palate displays a great structure with a good balance. The intense finish is underlined by well-integrated woody notes.

Dark colour, dense with bright highlights. Intense nose of black fruits, spice and roasted notes. The attack is wide and elegant, marked by ripe black fruit. The mid-palate displays a great structure with a good balance. The intense finish is underlined by well-integrated woody notes.

Strawberry colour. High aromatic intensity which highlights thefruityaromas of strawberry, raspberry and notes of violet flowers with abackground of tomato leaves. Sweet and stylish entry point, recalling thearomas of red fruits. Unctuous, fresh and very balanced on the palate withalingering and persistent aftertaste.

Strawberry colour. High aromatic intensity which highlights thefruityaromas of strawberry, raspberry and notes of violet flowers with abackground of tomato leaves. Sweet and stylish entry point, recalling thearomas of red fruits. Unctuous, fresh and very balanced on the palate withalingering and persistent aftertaste.
Extracted at low temperatures, this wine has a very concentrated flavour. The fermentation is carried out at controlled temperatures and stops naturally.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Sottimano Bric Del Salto Dolcetto D'Alba DOC 2016
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016- Bric Del Salto Dolcetto D'Alba Doc

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The 2016 Dolcetto d'Alba Bric del Salto is deep, rich and very nicely textured in the glass. Expect Raspberry and blackberry on the palate with very fine, clinging tannins Blueberries, cloves, menthol and licorice all flesh out on the inviting, layered finish. The style is muscular and intense, but very nicely balanced.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016- Bric Del Salto Dolcetto D'Alba Doc

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce barolo classique dploie des armes balsamiques d'eucalyptus, de thym et de feuille de laurier, relevs de nuances de rose et de cuir. La bouche livre des saveurs de cerise sauvage et de menthe qui se manifestent en couches profondes. Il est dj attrayant grce ses tanins mrs et fermes et son acidit frache, mais il peut aussi tre encav pendant une dcennie ou plus.

This classically crafted Barolo has a balsamic fragrance of eucalyptus, thyme and bay leaf, with hints of rose and leather. The palate delivers wild cherry and mint flavors that show layers of depth. With its firm, ripe tannins and fresh acidity, this is already enjoyable, but will age well for a decade or more.

Dark black cherry hue with good intense nose and predominant strong red and black fruits, soft toasted notes. Fresh in the mouth, laced with tannin, good acidity and finish.

Clear and brilliant, straw yellow in colour with good intensity aromatics of citrus and tropical fruit; lime, lemon, mango over light toasted and spice notes from the oak aging. On the palate dry rich and unctuous with lime zest and peachy fruit, subtle spice and crisp acidity of considerable length.

PrimaryInformation.Description: 2014-Do Vino De Pago De Los Balagueses

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Deep cherry-red hue, medium-high brilliant rim. Enjoys an intense bouquet of crisp red and black fruit, freshly balsamic, evoking the lower slopes, aromatic herbs and deep toasted notes. Delicious, soft on the palate with a liquorice aftertaste.

Net et moelleux en bouche, avec d'allchants armes fruits, ce spiritueux classique sera trs polyvalent pour vos cocktails et accords gourmands.

Looking for an alternative spirit that you can sip solo or reach for as a base for a delicious cocktail? Clean, smooth sipping and displaying fruity aromas, this classic distilled spirit shows great versatility for your mixing and matching.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Creemore Springs Mad & Noisy Lagered Ale
PrimaryInformation.Description: Creemore Springs Mad & Noisy Lagered Ale
Creemore Springs Mad & Noisy Lagered Ale

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ontario's Creemore Springs Brewery patterned their lagered ale after German Kolsch style beers. The Mad & Noisy Lagered Ale displays a fruity roundness with a touch of floral hops, light honey and cereal maltiness and a dry, crisp finish. Best paired with lighter cuisine: white fish, omelettes, and chicken.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Creemore Springs Mad & Noisy Lagered Ale

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: IMA Imayo Tsukasa Junmai Sake for Oyster
PrimaryInformation.Description: Ima Imayo Tsukasa Junmai Sake For Oyster

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce sak junmai a t conu pour accompagner les hutres. Il est dlicat, doux, lgrement acide et riche en saveurs sales et umami. agencer avec des hutres crues, bouillies ou fumes et d'autres fruits de mer. Produit par Imayo Tsukasa, brasserie de Niigata qui se spcialise dans le sak junmai.

This Junmai was specifically designed to pair with oysters. Gentle, sweet, light acidity, lots of umami/savoury notes. Pair with raw, boiled or smoked oysters and other seafood. Produced by Imayo Tsukasa, Niigata's all Junmai Sake Brewery.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Ima Imayo Tsukasa Junmai Sake For Oyster

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: 100 % palomino. Le bouquet concentr rvle d'attrayants armes de fruits, d'corce d'orange et de fleurs blanches et d'intenses armes noisets; la bouche riche et complexe dploie de gnreuses notes de pomme et un doux soupon de miso. Un manzanilla dlicat, ouvert et long en finale tout fait dlicieux. Prix platine, meilleur du concours dans la catgorie des meilleurs vins fortifis secs.

100% Palomino. Appetising concentrated nose showing characterful fruit, orange skin, white flowers, and intense nutty aromas; a rich palate, complex, with lots of apples and a touch of sweet miso. Delicate and open, with long finish, a gorgeous manzanilla. Platinum - Best in Show: Best Value Dry Fortified.

A gold medal winner at the 2017 World Spirits Competition. Maturation in bourbon barrels contributes to a nose of caramel, vanilla, spice and oak. A finely balanced palate, with flavours that build slowly - an initial impression of dryness evolves to light sweetness with spicy notes and a warm finish.

A finely balanced palate, with flavours that build slowly - an initial impression of dryness evolves to light sweetness with spicy notes and a warm finish.
Very rich aromas, with expressive flavors of pear and honey. Lively and enjoyable on its own or with seafood and lighter fare.
Very rich aromas, with expressive flavors of pear and honey. Lively and enjoyable on its own or with seafood and lighter fare.

La maison Ilok Cellars est situe dans le village croate d'Ilok, sur le bord du Danube. Ce vin frais, parfum et juteux rvle des nuances de pomme verte et de citron releves de notes d'pices poivres. Un vin indit et une fabuleuse aubaine. Mettez-le au frais et savourez-le avec les salades du jardin ou les poitrines de poulet grilles marines au citron et l'huile d'olive.

Ilok Cellars is situated in the Croatian town of Ilok, on the banks of the Danube River. This is a fresh, fragrant, juicy wine with green apple and lemon sprinkled with peppery spice. An interesting departure and a stunning value. Chill and sip with garden salads, or grilled chicken breasts marinated in lemon and olive oil.

PrimaryInformation.Description: 14 Petite Sirah Girard Napa (Vintage Wine Estates)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: La maison Girard a produit cette dlicieuse petite sirah 2014 de la valle Napa qui est offerte prix trs avantageux. Elle offre des armes opulents de bleuet, de mre et de fleurs blanches, des tanins soyeux et une note florale typique impartie par le fruit attrayant. Un vin massif et exubrant dguster au cours des 10 prochaines annes. Priode de consommation : 2016 2026.

Girard has turned out a beautiful 2014 Petite Sirah from Napa Valley that sells for a song. Luscious blueberry and blackberry fruit, white flowers, silky tannins and that unmistakable floral note from the beautiful fruit jump from the glass of this big, boisterous and exuberant Petite Sirah. Drink it over the next decade. Drink Date: 2016-2026.

PrimaryInformation.Description: (V) Chateauneuf Du Pape Cuv. Barberini (Dom. Sol

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin juteux et charnu dploie des saveurs de mre, de mre de Boysen et de ptes de fruits la framboise releves par moments de lgres notes d'anis, d'pices douces et de gteau aux fruits. La fracheur est au rendez-vous, malgr la dominante fruite de l'ensemble. son mieux entre 2017 et 2028.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Cuvée Barberini Domaine de la Solitude

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: A juicy, fleshy style, with prominent blackberry, boysenberry and raspberry pte de fruit flavors holding sway throughout, while light anise, sweet spice and fruitcake notes fill in where they can. Maintains freshness despite the fruit-dominant profile. Best from 2017 through 2028.

Fascinating wine with stone, tobacco and plum aromas and flavors. Full body, with soft and velvety tannins and a fruity finish. Balanced. Drink after 2013.

There is an immediate eye appeal which is shining and the floral aromas of orange and white blossom together with honeyed notes and nutty acorns which lead into a clean fresh yet soft complexity. It smells like yellow and tastes like the words from AA Milne. With time in the glass the taste progresses towards a long and rounded mouth texture clipped with cleansing acidity and framed by silken tannins. It is soft and appealing and the mouth flavours have not been altered with any additional fining from animal products so it is an honest expression from our place to your face. Enjoy. Unfined. Contains no animal products.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Millton Clos d S Anne Syrah 2015
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 Millton Clos D S Anne Syrah

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The aromas include rosehip and white pepper. The palate is forward, yet sweet, with rich full flavours followed by a silken acidity; with elegant rather than aggressive tannin. The texture is sensual without being overpowering. As black as thunder and sweet as a teenage kiss. The savoury acidity is Pinot silk-like that flows leaving a current of tantalising dark fruit on a warm landing. Bottled on the property, using the finest natural cork. Store lying down. This wine also enjoys a time to rest in a decanter before serving. Unfined
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 Millton Clos D S Anne Syrah

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Millton Clos d S Anne Syrah 2015

PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 Millton Clos D S Anne Syrah

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The 2016 harvest produced wonderfully ripe grapes and full crunchy flavours. I make this wine in a fruit-forward style with the freshness of an ocean breeze and the texture of fine silt loam. The young juice is fermented in stainless steel tanks with natural yeasts and no further additions in the form of finings. This is a versatile food wine, particularly suitable with seafood, cheeses and summer salads. A glass of Gisborne Sunshine!

The 2016 harvest produced wonderfully ripe grapes and full crunchy flavours. I make this wine in a fruit-forward style with the freshness of an ocean breeze and the texture of fine silt loam. The young juice is fermented in stainless steel tanks with natural yeasts and no further additions in the form of finings. This is a versatile food wine, particularly suitable with seafood, cheeses and summer salads. A glass of Gisborne Sunshine!

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Millton Clos de Ste. Anne Chardonnay 2015
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 Millton Clos D S Anne Chardonnay

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Biodynamically, we often talk about luminosity, and this wine has a lovely brightness and smells like gold. Exotic perfumes of acorns, vanilla, and almonds welcome the finesse and delicacy combined with a full rich palate. These rich layered flavours give a chew and bite to the mouth. Complete with refreshing natural acidity. Very tactile.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 Millton Clos D S Anne Chardonnay

Revealing incredible quality and performing better than it did from barrel, the 2009 appears to be the greatest Pichon Longueville Baron since the 1990 and 1989. An amazing opaque blue/purple color is followed by scents of spring flowers, graphite, smoky charcoal, incense, blackberries, blueberries and hints of coffee and chocolate. Incredibly intense, pure and flawlessly constructed with extravagant layers of fruit and richness, this offering has developed beautifully under the management of Christian Seeley. It is a voluptuous, opulent Pichon Longueville Baron that may eclipse anything they have made in the past. This brilliant wine should be at its peak between 2018 and 2045.

Relativement souple pour un saint-estphe, ce vin renferme nanmoins suffisamment de tanins fermes pour mettre le fruit de l'avant. Il est structur et toff et gorg de nuances de jus de prune et d'acidit. Excellent potentiel de garde. Une slection pour le cellier.

Relatively soft for a St.-Estphe, this nevertheless has plenty of firm tannins to project the powerful fruit forward. It has structure and weight, piled with plum juice and acidity. Great aging potential. Cellar Selection.

Pale straw colour; citrus and peach fruit with gentle grassy notes; dry, with fine balancing acidity, light tropical fruit, melon and citrus on the palate; dry, crisp and well balanced on the finish.

A new version of the traditional retsina. With a fine aroma of pine and a strain of lemon. Blond in colour and beautifully balanced, this wine speaks to the finest palate. The perfect accompaniment to Mediterranean hors d'oeuvres, seafood and fish.

Un charmant vin aux armes et saveurs de petits fruits noirs, d'pices et de chocolat. Mi-cors a cors, soutenu par des tanins soyeux et finale fruite. L'assemblage renferme les varits sangiovese, cabernet sauvignon, petit verdot et montepulciano d'abruzzo. Prt boire.

Pretty wine with dark berry, spice and chocolate aromas and flavors. Full to medium body, silky tannins and a fruity finish. It is a blend of sangiovese, cabernet sauvignon, petit verdot, and montepulciano d'abruzzo. Drink now.

Made entirely with Sangiovese, this is a hearty red withbeautiful aromas of ripe berry and toastedoak. A dense solid palate of blackcherry, French oak and white pepper alongside chewy tanninsbut the heat ofevident alcohol dominates the finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Cantine Due Palme Sangaetano Primitivo di Manduria 2015

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le primitivo est le mme cpage que le zinfandel. Ce vin a t lev six mois en ft de chne amricain ce qui relve ses saveurs fruites affirmes de quelques tonalits fumes. Souple et facile d'approche, ce primitivo gorg du soleil de l'Italie mridionale rvle de la complexit et des nuances de cerise, de prune, de mre, de fraise, de raisin sec, de cuir et d'pices. Il fera des accords dlicieux avec les bouts de ctes cuits au four ou les ptes orecchiette aux rapinis et l'ail.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Primitivo di Manduria Sangaetano Cantine due Palme

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Primitivo is the same grape variety as Zinfandel, and this wine spent six months in American oak, adding smoky shading to the grape's bold, fruity flavours. A supple, easygoing "Prim" grown in Italy's sunny south, this wine's also got a fair bit of complexity, showing cherry, plum, mulberry, strawberry, raisin, leather and spice notes. Pair with oven-baked short ribs, or orecchiette pasta with broccoli rabe and garlic.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Cantine Due Palme Sangaetano Primitivo di Manduria 2015

A modern landmark in the distillery district - the copper columns of the still at the Spirit of York Distillery are revealed by a striking transparent glass tower. For their gin, juniper joins selected botanicals resulting in a gin that is delicate, with a floral bouquet, bright citrus notes and a distinct juniper finish.

A modern landmark in the distillery district - the copper columns of the still at the Spirit of York Distillery are revealed by a striking transparent glass tower. For their gin, juniper joins selected botanicals resulting in a gin that is delicate, with a floral bouquet, bright citrus notes and a distinct juniper finish.

The nose is delicate and pleasant, with aromas of peach and white flowers. Notes of strawberries rise from the back of the palate with a touch of apple for a crisp finish. Pair with ceviche, tuna and salmon tartar, fresh salads, octopus, Asian cuisine and seafood.

The nose is delicate and pleasant, with aromas of peach and white flowers. Notes of strawberries rise from the back of the palate with a touch of apple for a crisp finish. Pair with ceviche, tuna and salmon tartar, fresh salads, octopus, Asian cuisine and seafood.

A blend of grapes harvested from old vines planted in volcanic soil. Aged nine months in French-oak barrels. A full-bodied wine, with complex dark fruit aromas of blackberry, Bing cherry, and plum with notes of cocoa, vanilla spice, and cinnamon.

A blend of grapes harvested from old vines planted in volcanic soil. Aged nine months in French-oak barrels. A full-bodied wine, with complex dark fruit aromas of blackberry, Bing cherry, and plum with notes of cocoa, vanilla spice, and cinnamon.

Intense aromatic character of exotic fruits and white flowers with mild minerality (dominating features of the Riesling variety in mild Mediterranean terroir). Delicately acid palate with a sense of volume (influence of the Lagorthi variety). The after-taste leaves sense of fresh exotic tropical fruits. Ideal with salads, fresh white cheese, seafood and white meat with white sauce.

Intense aromatic character of exotic fruits and white flowers with mild minerality (dominating features of the Riesling variety in mild Mediterranean terroir). Delicately acid palate with a sense of volume (influence of the Lagorthi variety). The after-taste leaves sense of fresh exotic tropical fruits. Ideal with salads, fresh white cheese, seafood and white meat with white sauce.

Intense red colour with purple hues. Red and black fruit, black pepper in the nose. Soft with velvet tannins and good volume in the mouth. Fruity aftertaste. Perfect for yellow aged cheeses, meat roasted or with red sauces

Intense red colour with purple hues. Red and black fruit, black pepper in the nose. Soft with velvet tannins and good volume in the mouth. Fruity aftertaste. Perfect for yellow aged cheeses, meat roasted or with red sauces

Intense red colour with purple hues. Red fruits, plum and green pepper with some vanilla notes in the nose. Dense with good acidity and gentle tannins in the mouth. Long, fruity aftertaste. Perfect for yellow aged cheeses and meat dishes.

Intense red colour with purple hues. Red fruits, plum and green pepper with some vanilla notes in the nose. Dense with good acidity and gentle tannins in the mouth. Long, fruity aftertaste. Perfect for yellow aged cheeses and meat dishes.

Bright yellow colour with green hues. Peach, exotic fruits and asparagus on the nose. Balanced in the mouth with good acidity and volume. Citrus aftertaste. Perfect for white-sauce pastas, salads and yellow aged cheeses.

An un-aged version of the famous Hundred Years of Solitude shochu. Spicy barley aromatics with notes of cocoa and earthiness.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Dark plum compote aromas with ripe soft tannins. A very attractive and textured palate with dark bitter chocolate notes and a beautiful finish.

Fresh and delicate with balanced acidity. A light citrusfragrance on the nose.
Fresh and delicate with balanced acidity. A light citrusfragrance on the nose.

Bien pourvu en notes essentielles de cerise et de framboise noire, ce pinot noir n'hsite pas montrer ses vraies couleurs. Il prend de l'ampleur au fur et mesure que se manifestent ses notes de chne et de gousse de vanille, pour diminuer petit petit en fin de bouche.

Radiant with vital cherry and black raspberry goodness, this Pinot holds nothing back in showing off its true colours. It builds to a full-bodied proposition as dashes of oak and vanilla bean appear on the palate before gradually diminishing on the finish.

Radiant with vital cherry and black raspberry goodness, this Pinot holds nothing back in showing off its true colours. It builds to a full-bodied proposition as dashes of oak and vanilla bean appear on the palate before gradually diminishing on the finish.

L'harmonie des saveurs fruits qu'offre ce pinot est le fruit d'un doigt magistral de la part de son crateur. La framboise noire et la cerise juteuse forment l'chine de ce rouge cors dont les saveurs voluent avec une douce lgance. Une harmonieuse note de vanille persiste en finale.

A masterful touch is at work, as evidenced by the balance of fruity flavours this Pinot proposes. Black raspberry and juicy cherry are the backbone of this full-bodied red, as the flavours evolve with gentle elegance. A perfectly pitched vanilla note lingers on the finish.

Ceci est la nouvelle dition du Xrs Fino Perdido 1/15 non millsim Snchez Romate, mais malheureusement la date de mise en bouteille n'est pas clairement indique. Son numro de lot (L17094) nous laisse deviner qu'il a t mis en bouteille le 94e jour de 2017. Cela cadre bien avec ma dernire dgustation, durant laquelle les notes de chne avaient presque entirement disparu pour montrer des notes de vieux Fino. Production totale : 6 000 bouteilles. Priode de consommation : 2017 2020.

This is a new bottling of the NV Fino Perdido 1/15 from Snchez Romate, but unfortunately the bottling, or saca, date is not obvious on the label and it's just a coded lot number (L17094, I guess day number 94 of 2017). This is in line with my last tasting, during which the oak had virtually disappeared and the wine was gaining old Fino character. 6,000 bottles produced. Drink Date: 2017-2020.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Whiskey américain Ezra Brooks 7 ans d'âge

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Crafted from genuine sour mash made the traditional way and aged for several years in new charred American oak barrels, ensuring an exceptionally smooth spirit. The notes of caramel, banana, orange blossom, spice, vanilla and oak fill the bouquet and resonate on the palate, adding balance to the fiery but flavourful finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Tomatin 2007 Caribbean Rum Cask Highland Single Malt Scotch Whisky

PrimaryInformation.Description: Whisky écossais Tomatin Le 2007 Fût de rhum des Caraïbes

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Tomatin has been working to develop the softer side of Speyside with its heavily honeyed whiskies; this limited edition is finished in rum casks for added nuances of dried fruit and Christmas spice. Smooth and luxurious on the palate it is replete with floral, honey, and candied fruit that finishes with a pop of cinnamon.

Fresh, fruity and slightly tannic on the palate, it finishes off with a lingering minerality. As an aperitif, or ideally paired with smoked ham, salami, pat or shrimps. With some lightly fried fingerfood or light summer dishes or typical Tuscan antipasti based on cheese and salumi.

A new standard in vodka from Stolichnaya. Made exclusively from corn and buckwheat, it offers all of the character that made Stoli famous without any of the gluten. Expect aromas and flavours of citrus, sweet grain and dried fruit. Palate is medium-bodied with a lingering finish. Enjoy with club soda and a lemon wedge.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Rhum brun Flor de Cana Anejo Clasico 5
Rhum brun Flor de Cana Anejo Clasico 5

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Martin Miller created this modern gin classic in 1998 upon finding he could not buy a decent gin and tonic. His gin is pot distilled, using the heart of the spirit only, and then enhanced with 10 select botanicals. Its aromatic notes of juniper and citrus carry on to the palate and end in a smooth finish. Pass the tonic!

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Cet assemblage dlicieusement cors renferme le cpage encruzado crmeux et aussi le malvasia parfum. Personnalit fume et texture crmeuse. With creamy Encruzado and perfumed Malvasia in the blend, this is a deliciously full-bodied wine. There is a smoky character as well as a creamy texture. The wine is young and fruity but ready to drink, although it will be better from 2018. Ranked #19 in the 2017 Wine Enthusiast's Top 100 Best Buys.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Barista is a coffee liqueur made with Kona coffee, dark chocolate and Caribbean rum. It pours a deep brown colour, and has aromas and flavours of freshly-brewed coffee and dark chocolate. It has a silky smooth texture, and it has a balanced, moderate level of sweetness; use in your favourite coffee-inspired cocktails.

Barista is a coffee liqueur made with Kona coffee, dark chocolate and Caribbean rum. It pours a deep brown colour, and has aromas and flavours of freshly-brewed coffee and dark chocolate. It has a silky smooth texture, and it has a balanced, moderate level of sweetness; use in your favourite coffee-inspired cocktails.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Liqueur à la crème Marshmallow Pop

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Think of this whimsical liqueur as strawberries and cream, wrapped in a velvety robe of marshmallow. Lusciously sweet, it can be poured over ice, used in cocktails and blender drinks, or incorporated as an ingredient in dessert recipes.

Superbe assemblage 50 % de merlot et 45 % de cabernet sauvignon avec un peu de cabernet franc, ce vin issu de cette proprit bien connue est aussi spectaculaire en 2010 qu'il a toujours t. Rvlation du millsime, ce vin engageant dploie de copieuses nuances de cerise noire mre et de cassis releves de notes de tapis forestier et de rglisse, et d'un soupon de chne. La bouche mi-corse corse est riche et texture et l'ensemble trs sducteur vous apportera beaucoup de plaisir pendant encore sept ou huit ans. boire entre 2013 et 2021.

A superb blend of 50% Merlot, 45% Cabernet Sauvignon and the rest Cabernet Franc, the 2010 from this well-known property has performed as well as I've ever tasted. A sleeper of the vintage, this endearing style of wine has copious quantities of ripe black cherry and black currant fruit interwoven with hints of forest floor, licorice and subtle background oak. It is medium to full-bodied, rich, textured and, overall, an enormously seductive style of wine to drink over the next 7-8 years. Drink 2013-2021.

PrimaryInformation.Description: 14 St.Pierre De Corbian St. Estephe (Wine Merchant

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le Chteau Saint-Pierre de Corbian 2014 est particulirement puissant et intense, surtout pour un vin de cette gamme de qualit. D'abondantes nuances de graphite, de fume, de lavande et de goudron enveloppent les saveurs de fruits noirs de ce vin mystrieux d'une personnalit envotante. Un vin nergique qui en met plein les papilles pour le prix. En 2014, l'assemblage renferme autant de cabernet sauvignon que de merlot, il a fait l'objet de pigeages manuels et d'un levage sous chne, dont 40 % de fts neufs. Simon Blanchard de l'quipe de Stphane Derenoncourt a agi titre d'oenologue-conseil dans l'laboration de ce vin qui pourrait bien tre l'un des joyaux du millsime.

The 2014 Saint-Pierre de Corbian is endowed with a real sense of power and intensity, especially for a wine of this level. A host of graphite, smoke, lavender and tar wrap around the black fruit as this mysterious wine shows off its compelling personality. A wine of pulsating energy, the 2014 punches well above its weight. The 2014 is a blend of equal parts Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, done with manual punch-downs and aged in 40% new oak. Simon Blanchard from Stphane Derenoncourt's team consults in what is shaping up to be one of the under the radar gems of the vintage.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Darker than ruby red. Red and dark berries with hint of anise. Intensely fruity perfume, with accents of red berry fruit and raspberry. Dry, well balanced, with good structure. Ideal with first and second courses consisting of meat, and with mature cheeses.

Darker than ruby red. Red and dark berries with hint of anise. Intensely fruity perfume, with accents of red berry fruit and raspberry. Dry, well balanced, with good structure. Ideal with first and second courses consisting of meat, and with mature cheeses.

Intense cherry pink. Broad, fresh and intense, with forward fruity aromas of red berry, and some mineral nuances. Fresh and harmonious, with good structure and a crisp acidity. Excellent as a summer aperitif, or paired with pasta, salads, white meats, and first and second courses based on fish.

Intense cherry pink. Broad, fresh and intense, with forward fruity aromas of red berry, and some mineral nuances. Fresh and harmonious, with good structure and a crisp acidity. Excellent as a summer aperitif, or paired with pasta, salads, white meats, and first and second courses based on fish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Pelee Island Lola Cabernet Franc Rosé 2017
PrimaryInformation.Description: 17 Pelee Island Lola Cabernet Franc Rose

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Les nuances de fraise frachement cueillie, de canneberge acidule et de pamplemousse rose dominent au nez comme en bouche, entremles de notes d'pices mlanges et soutenues par une acidit qui rafrachit la bouche jusqu'au bout de la finale. Bien rafrachir et servir comme tel ou avec un plateau de charcuteries fines. Un rapport qualit-prix avantageux.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Cabernet Franc Rosé Lola Pelee Island

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Aromas and flavours of freshly picked strawberry, tangy cranberry and ruby red grapefruit dominate the nose and palate intertwined with notions of mixed spice and excellent acidity prevailing through the palate infusing the finish then aftertaste. Pour well chilled on its own or with a mixed deli board. The price-quality balance tips in your favour.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 17 Pelee Island Lola Cabernet Franc Rose

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Di Meo Taurasi Riserva Vigna Olmo 2008
PrimaryInformation.Description: #08 Taurasi Rs Docg Vigna Olmo (Di Meo)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Des armes de pruneau, d'pices exotiques, de cuir et de charcuterie sont au premier plan, tandis que la bouche ronde et clatante rvle des saveurs de cerise noire sche, de mre, de rglisse et de tabac. La finale culmine avec une note minrale de silex. Tanins soyeux. Dj accessible. boire jusqu'en 2020.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Taurasi Riserva Vigna Olmo Di Meo

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Prune, exotic spice, leather and cured meat aromas take center stage while the bright rounded palate offers dried black cherry, blackberry, licorice and tobacco. A flinty mineral note closes the finish. It's already accessible, with silky tannins. Drink through 2020.
PrimaryInformation.Description: #08 Taurasi Rs Docg Vigna Olmo (Di Meo)

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Di Meo Taurasi Riserva Vigna Olmo 2008
PrimaryInformation.Description: #08 Taurasi Rs Docg Vigna Olmo (Di Meo)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Des armes de pruneau, d'pices exotiques, de cuir et de charcuterie sont au premier plan, tandis que la bouche ronde et clatante rvle des saveurs de cerise noire sche, de mre, de rglisse et de tabac. La finale culmine avec une note minrale de silex. Tanins soyeux. Dj accessible. boire jusqu'en 2020.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Taurasi Riserva Vigna Olmo Di Meo

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Prune, exotic spice, leather and cured meat aromas take center stage while the bright rounded palate offers dried black cherry, blackberry, licorice and tobacco. A flinty mineral note closes the finish. It's already accessible, with silky tannins. Drink through 2020.
PrimaryInformation.Description: #08 Taurasi Rs Docg Vigna Olmo (Di Meo)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: A blend of 1-year old lambic aged in 30-year old Tuscan Brunello di Montalcino barrels and 3-year old lambic aged in Beersel's own foeders. Amber gold in colour with deep bursts of vinous character with typical fragrance of wild ferments.Taste combines a pleasant bitterness of grapefruit with a fine red wine taste from the wooden foeders resulting in a sour, yet well-rounded character

A blend of 1-year old lambic aged in 30-year old Tuscan Brunello di Montalcino barrels and 3-year old lambic aged in Beersel's own foeders. Amber gold in colour with deep bursts of vinous character with typical fragrance of wild ferments.Taste combines a pleasant bitterness of grapefruit with a fine red wine taste from the wooden foeders resulting in a sour, yet well-rounded character

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Auntsfield South Oaks Barrel Fermented Sauvignon Blanc 2015
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 South Oaks Barrel Fermented Sauv Bl

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Bright straw colour. Ripe tropical fruit core with mango, ripe passionfruit and citrus. Lifted notes of dry herbs and lime leaf, supplemented by complex aromas of honeycomb, vanilla bean and roasted hazelnut. The wine displays a tension and great length. The palate is tight and fresh, supported with a rich and creamy structure and underlying chalky minerality providing linear structure. The mouthfeel is intense and yet seamless and well balanced.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 South Oaks Barrel Fermented Sauv Bl

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Auntsfield South Oaks Barrel Fermented Sauvignon Blanc 2015
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 South Oaks Barrel Fermented Sauv Bl

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Bright straw colour. Ripe tropical fruit core with mango, ripe passionfruit and citrus. Lifted notes of dry herbs and lime leaf, supplemented by complex aromas of honeycomb, vanilla bean and roasted hazelnut. The wine displays a tension and great length. The palate is tight and fresh, supported with a rich and creamy structure and underlying chalky minerality providing linear structure. The mouthfeel is intense and yet seamless and well balanced.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015 South Oaks Barrel Fermented Sauv Bl

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Bright straw colour. Displays ripe fruit aromas of nectarine and peach with subtle aromas of mandarin peel and roasted characters. Lifted notes of dried herbs complimented by complex aromas of flint, roasted hazelnut and honeycomb. The pallet is concentrated and beautifully textured with a flowing mouth-feel. The fruit weight and oak balance combine with a perfectly pitched acidity, providing a superb fresh linier and creamy structure.

Bright straw colour. Displays ripe fruit aromas of nectarine and peach with subtle aromas of mandarin peel and roasted characters. Lifted notes of dried herbs complimented by complex aromas of flint, roasted hazelnut and honeycomb. The pallet is concentrated and beautifully textured with a flowing mouth-feel. The fruit weight and oak balance combine with a perfectly pitched acidity, providing a superb fresh linier and creamy structure.

Deep red colour. Lifted primary berry and ripe plum aromas supported by floral notes and other complexing characters. Rich and ripe on the palate. Upfront weight and appeal with lashings of oak and tannin that give the wine a bold and lengthy structure. No shrinking violet- this wine is very drinkable and will have wide appeal.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Château Val Joanis Cuvée Joséphine Rosé 2017

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Les armes parfums de framboise et de groseille rouge grappes se juxtaposent aux notes de ronce et de pierre broye dans le bouquet de ce ros lgant. La bouche irrsistible, tonifiante et frache est gorge de saveurs juteuses de petits fruits rouges et de cerise et couronne par une finale saline et minrale d'une grande fracheur.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Rosé Cuvée Joséphine Château Val Joanis

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Perfumed notes of raspberry and red currant are juxtaposed by bramble and crushed stone on the nose of this elegant ros. It's irresistibly juicy-full of red berry and cherry flavors yet revitalizing and fresh, with a cooling salt- and mineral-laced finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Château Val Joanis Cuvée Joséphine Rosé 2017

Intense deep ruby red colour. Very fragrant, with intense fruit aromas of cherries and raspberries, followed by lighter more complex hints of licorice and coffee. Velvety, sweet tannins, with a full, fruity palate and a memorable finish.

Intense deep ruby red colour. Very fragrant, with intense fruit aromas of cherries and raspberries, followed by lighter more complex hints of licorice and coffee. Velvety, sweet tannins, with a full, fruity palate and a memorable finish.

Intense ruby red in colour, with purple hues. The nose opens with elegant, clean aromas of red fruits suggesting cherry and blackberry, without excessive wood. The palate is intense, smooth and balanced. The finish, long and memorable..

Intense ruby red in colour, with purple hues. The nose opens with elegant, clean aromas of red fruits suggesting cherry and blackberry, without excessive wood. The palate is intense, smooth and balanced. The finish, long and memorable..

Extremely intense ruby red colour and good complex fruit aromas without excessive hints of oak. With aeration after opening the wine gradually releases delicate hints of mint, licorice and pepper. Food Pairing: Antipasto with meats, rich hard cheeses, braised beef, osso buco, veal & hearty stews

Extremely intense ruby red colour and good complex fruit aromas without excessive hints of oak. With aeration after opening the wine gradually releases delicate hints of mint, licorice and pepper. Food Pairing: Antipasto with meats, rich hard cheeses, braised beef, osso buco, veal & hearty stews

Le millsime2015 a t exceptionnel pour les rouges de la Bourgogne. Ce vin en tmoigne de manire loquente avec ses charmantes nuances de mre et ses notes florales saupoudres sur une structure souple et fine. dguster avec le canard grill ou le gibier plumes.

The 2015 vintage was an exceptional one for red wines in Burgundy, and this wine proves the point with lovely blackberry fruit and floral notes on a supple, finessed frame. Savour with grilled duck or game hen.

The 2015 vintage was an exceptional one for red wines in Burgundy, and this wine proves the point with lovely blackberry fruit and floral notes on a supple, finessed frame. Savour with grilled duck or game hen.
Citrus lemon colour. Delicate aroma, balanced and very fruity, fresh and elegant. Fresh and harmonious, with good acidity and citrus notes with a long and lingering finish.
Citrus lemon colour. Delicate aroma, balanced and very fruity, fresh and elegant. Fresh and harmonious, with good acidity and citrus notes with a long and lingering finish.

Pungent lemon pith and quinine scents are accompanied by deeper pear and melon qualities. Silky and penetrating on the palate, offering Meyer lemon and pear nectar flavors braced by a core of juicy acidity. A floral note arrives on the finish, which lingers with strong, mineral-driven tenacity.

Pungent lemon pith and quinine scents are accompanied by deeper pear and melon qualities. Silky and penetrating on the palate, offering Meyer lemon and pear nectar flavors braced by a core of juicy acidity. A floral note arrives on the finish, which lingers with strong, mineral-driven tenacity.

Pale gold. Highly aromatic scents of melon, nectarine and fennel, with a deeper suggestion of honey. Round and supple on entry, then livelier in the middle palate, offering zesty citrus and melon flavors and interesting beeswax and mineral nuances.

Pale gold. Highly aromatic scents of melon, nectarine and fennel, with a deeper suggestion of honey. Round and supple on entry, then livelier in the middle palate, offering zesty citrus and melon flavors and interesting beeswax and mineral nuances.

Bright violet color. Fresh raspberry and lavender on the zesty mineral- and spice-accented nose and palate. Juicy and precise, showing a silky texture and no excess fat. In an elegant style, with smooth tannins coming in late to contribute shape and gentle grip.Bright violet color. Fresh raspberry and lavender on the zesty mineral- and spice-accented nose and palate. Family owned for generations winery. Filippo, Laura and Federica have outmost respect for the land. Monforte d'Alba, Barolo and Novello communes vineyards. Manual harvest in October. Aged for more than 10 months in Slavonian and French oak, then at least 10 months in the bottle. Serve at 18 C with med-ripen cheese, red meat and spicy dishes.

Deep crimson. Lifted, sweet-sour cherry and blueberry nose and supple, dark and sour cherry palate with quite a bit of chewy tannin and acidity. Mouthfilling aromas.
Deep crimson. Lifted, sweet-sour cherry and blueberry nose and supple, dark and sour cherry palate with quite a bit of chewy tannin and acidity. Mouthfilling aromas.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Filippo Broccardo Barolo I Tre Pais 2014

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: From three vineyards in the communes of Monforte d'Alba, Barolo and Novello. Mid ruby with orange tinges. At the nose hints of liquorice. Lithe and fragrant palate with proper tannic grip, but not overwhelming the fruit. A pretty wine.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Filippo Broccardo Barolo I Tre Pais 2014

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: From three vineyards in the communes of Monforte d'Alba, Barolo and Novello. Mid ruby with orange tinges. At the nose hints of liquorice. Lithe and fragrant palate with proper tannic grip, but not overwhelming the fruit. A pretty wine.

Brilliant, attractive ruby-red colour. The bouquet is ample and remarkably complex, with vinous characteristic tones. Dry on the palate and gracious, with delicate and soft veining and a soft harmonious balance.

Brilliant, attractive ruby-red colour. The bouquet is ample and remarkably complex, with vinous characteristic tones. Dry on the palate and gracious, with delicate and soft veining and a soft harmonious balance.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Zonin Classici Pinot Grigio Aquileia DOC 2017

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Appealing straw-yellow colour and delicate green reflections. A bouquet of delicately fruity, relatively full and ample with an ensemble of aromas of great finesse. The palate is lightly dry, yet extremely fresh. Its pleasantly balanced and elegant structure makes this an unusually refined and aristocratic wine.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Zonin Classici Pinot Grigio Aquileia DOC 2017

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Principi di Butera Sero Insolia Sicilia DOC 2016
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016 Sero Insolia Sicilia Doc Principi B

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: A bright golden straw-yellow, with faint greenish highlights. The Bouquet is very elegant with hints of broom flowers, pear and tropical fruit, together with spicy notes of vanilla, cinnamon and white pepper. The flavour is rich and deep, with delicate sweetish and spicy notes at the end.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016 Sero Insolia Sicilia Doc Principi B

2016 Ca Bolani Aquila Sauv Blanc Friuli

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Gold and emerald tones. The bouquet has prominent floral and herbal notes, mixed with scents of fresh elderberry, papaya, and passion fruit, mingled with mint notes. The palate is fresh and full, well-balanced with a silky texture, and reveals a mouthwatering lemon merinque with crushed chalk minerals that lead to a long refreshing finish.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016 Ca Bolani Aquila Sauv Blanc Friuli

Prosecco Doc Frizzante Tenuta Ca Bolani

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Pale straw-yellow colour with a white persistent foam. The bouquet is refined and elegant with beautiful mineral notes, elegant white flowers, enhanced by pleasing fruity notes. The palate is extremely harmonious and pleasant with a hint of sweet almond, typical of Glera grapes.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Prosecco Doc Frizzante Tenuta Ca Bolani

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Rocca Di Montemassi Syrosa Maremma Toscana DOC 2017
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2017 Syrosa Maremma Toscana Doc Rocca M

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: A soft pink colour with coral hues. To the nose it reflects the Maremma Toscana terroir with hints of lavender and red berries typical of Syrah grapes, and citrusy mandarin notes. An excellent balance of freshness and liveliness with notes of vanilla, peach and pomegranate. Silky, fresh and with a persistent finish, it is the perfect expression of the land that it comes from.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2017 Syrosa Maremma Toscana Doc Rocca M

PrimaryInformation.Description: 2017 Syrosa Maremma Toscana Doc Rocca M

A luminescent rose of subtle pink with a fine and delicate perlage. The bouquet is pleasantly intense and fruity with hints of pippin apple and light notes of small red berries. The flavour is smooth on the palate and flows with flowery and fruity notes.

Fresh and crisp red wine, with bright cherry flavours and full profile.

Dark inky ruby red in colour. On the nose, complex, sinuous, embracing, with an intense bouquet of ripe black cherry, dried red flowers, sweet oriental spices. It closes with balsamic sensations and liquorice. Elegant tannins in a soft balance, warm intense and fruity in the closing.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Concha y Toro Terrunyo Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
PrimaryInformation.Description: 15 Terrunyo Cabernet Sauvignon Do Pirque Maip

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Un vin rouge onctueux aux saveurs concentres de fruits noirs et de fruits rouges agrmentes de copieuses notes de chocolat fondu. Un vin trs crmeux, dot d'une finale opulente releve de riches notes d'pices et de moka. boire d'ici 2024. Dgust deux fois, avec les mmes rsultats.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Cabernet Sauvignon Terrunyo Concha y Toro

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: An unctuous red, dripping with molten chocolate notes that wrap around concentrated dark and red fruit flavors. Very creamy, with a plush finish that offers a rich array of spice and mocha details. Drink now through 2024. Tasted twice, with consistent notes.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 15 Terrunyo Cabernet Sauvignon Do Pirque Maip

A great addition to the McGuiness brand, Canada's best-selling line of mixable liqueurs. Crystal clear in appearance. Sweet apricot aromas and flavours with hints of brandy and fragrant notes of canned peach and orange blossom. The perfect ingredient in you favourite mixed drink or dessert recipe.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Saké à la poire asiatique Moonstone

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The infusion of Asian Pear essence is added just prior to bottling to maintain freshness of flavours. An aromatic a sake, mildly sweet with a crisp finish. Very light and approachable. An excellent mixer also.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Saké à la poire asiatique Moonstone

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Finca Patagonia Grand Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon/Syrah 2013
PrimaryInformation.Description: 13 Finca Patagonia Gran Reserva Cabernet Sau Syrah

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Les armes de chne grill, de caf et de petits fruits rafleux mnent une bouche charnue, mais toujours frache. Les saveurs de fruits noirs sont releves de notes de caf noir. Cet assemblage 65 % de cabernet sauvignon et 35 % de syrah rvle une finale de moka rti et de petits fruits herbacs.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Cabernet Sauvignon/Syrah Grand Reserve Finca Patagonia

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Toasty oak, coffee and rooty berry aromas feed into a full, fleshy but still fresh palate. Black-fruit flavors come with an accent of black coffee, while this blend of 65% Cabernet Sauvignon and 35% Syrah finishes with toasty mocha and herbal berry flavors.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 13 Finca Patagonia Gran Reserva Cabernet Sau Syrah

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Kill Devil Jamaica Monymusk 10 Year Old Single Cask Rum

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Bottled at 46%, unchillfiltered and no-colour added. Only 351 bottles were produced. Tropical nose of banana bread, citrus, brown sugar and cinnamon notes, leading to a floral finish. Distilled in March 2007 using pot stills and aged for 10 years.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Kill Devil Jamaica Hampdn Est 18yo S.Cas
