PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The bouquet reveals intense aromas of lavender, lilac, lemon balm and thyme. These are followed by perceptions of Amalfi lemons, grapefruit, white peach and gooseberries. On the mouth, it is fresh, sapid with a snappy structure and an intensely fruity aftertaste, with a balsamic and grassy finish.

The bouquet reveals intense aromas of lavender, lilac, lemon balm and thyme. These are followed by perceptions of Amalfi lemons, grapefruit, white peach and gooseberries. On the mouth, it is fresh, sapid with a snappy structure and an intensely fruity aftertaste, with a balsamic and grassy finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Collet Blanc de Blancs Brut Champagne

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce champagne quilibr et crmeux rvle des nuances de cerise blanche et d'amande effile soutenues par une acidit nette et agrmentes en finale de notes de fleurs du verger et de gingembre moulu. boire d'ici 2019.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Champagne Blanc de Blancs Brut Collet

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Crushed white cherry and slivered almond notes are framed by clean-cut acidity in this balanced, creamy Champagne, with accents of orchard blossom and ground ginger on the finish. Drink now through 2019.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Ommegang - Game Of Thrones Winter is Here

PrimaryInformation.Description: Ommegang - Game Of Thrones Winter is Here

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ninth in its Game of Thrones series is this Belgian-style double white ale. The label depicts the Night King, a key character in the tale. Story aside, the beer's velvety smooth frame is imbued with flavours of banana, clove, and white pepper.The lush mouthfeel and defined flavours ably balance its higher alcohol content.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Ommegang - Game Of Thrones Winter is Here

PrimaryInformation.Description: Ommegang - Game Of Thrones Winter is Here

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ninth in its Game of Thrones series is this Belgian-style double white ale. The label depicts the Night King, a key character in the tale. Story aside, the beer's velvety smooth frame is imbued with flavours of banana, clove, and white pepper.The lush mouthfeel and defined flavours ably balance its higher alcohol content.

Le nez agrablement floral rvle d'abondants armes de violette crase, de tisane et de coquille d'hutre, relevs de nuances de muscade et de cannelle. Bouche mi-corse, tanins fins, acidit frache et finale juteuse. boire ds maintenant.
A nicely floral nose shows a wealth of crushed violets, herbal tea, some oyster shell and hints of nutmeg and cinnamon. Medium body, fine tannins, fresh acidity and a juicy finish. Drink now.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Domaine Francois Feuillet Chambolle Musigny 1er cru Les Sentiers 20132013

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: "An airy, elegant and pure nose displays a mix of mostly red berry fruit scents where there is also plenty of floral character along with hints of earth, spice and smoke. Here too there is excellent volume to the sleekly muscular and more mineral-inflected middle weight flavors that possess a dusty mouth feel on the palate coating, balanced and beautifully persistent finish. This is powerful if not quite as powerful and I like the balance." (Score 90-92, Allan Meadows, January 2015)

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Domaine Francois Feuillet Chambolle Musigny 1er cru Les Sentiers 20132013

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: "An airy, elegant and pure nose displays a mix of mostly red berry fruit scents where there is also plenty of floral character along with hints of earth, spice and smoke. Here too there is excellent volume to the sleekly muscular and more mineral-inflected middle weight flavors that possess a dusty mouth feel on the palate coating, balanced and beautifully persistent finish. This is powerful if not quite as powerful and I like the balance." (Score 90-92, Allan Meadows, January 2015)

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Domaine Francois Feuillet Morey Saint Denis 1er cru Clos Sorbe 2013
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2013 Feuillet Morey St Den 1er Clos Sorb

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: "A pretty, fresh and relatively airy array of both red and dark currant aromas is given more breadth thanks to the presence of anise, sandalwood, earth and a hint of underbrush. The cool, pure and lightly mineral inflected flavors possess good volume and punch though the moderately austere finish displays a hint of dryness that may very well round out as the supporting tannins appear to be sufficiently ripe to do so." (Score 88-91, Allan Meadows, January 2015)
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2013 Feuillet Morey St Den 1er Clos Sorb

PrimaryInformation.Description: 2013 Feuillet Morey St Den 1er Clos Sorb

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: (from a mix of Brochon vines planted between 1922 and 1961 that average 60+ years of age) "...a ripe, cool and airy nose of dark berry fruit liqueur that is liberally laced with plenty of pungent Gevrey style earth notes that can also be found on the rich, dense and powerful flavors that possess a seductive texture thanks to the huge amount of dry extract that also imparts an opulent mouth feel. There is good structure here but it's almost invisible at present, again thanks to the abundance of extract. This is an outstanding wine for its level and one that will be approachable young but should age very well too. Drink 2018+." (Score 90. Allan Meadows, Jan 2013)

"Really vibrant cranberry and redcurrant fruit distinctive and crunchy. Lovely tannic feel too slightly sandy, but all in balance. Violet perfume and a long savoury finish. Very good, and reasonably priced. " (Score 17 out of 20, jancisrobinson.com, Jan 2014)

"Really vibrant cranberry and redcurrant fruit distinctive and crunchy. Lovely tannic feel too slightly sandy, but all in balance. Violet perfume and a long savoury finish. Very good, and reasonably priced. " (Score 17 out of 20, jancisrobinson.com, Jan 2014)

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Geantet Pansiot Haut Cotes de Nuits 2013
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2013 Geantet Pansiot Haut Cotes De Nuits

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The domaine ages its Hautes-Ctes for 14 months in oak barrels (using 30% new barrels), demonstrating its excellent expertise with this "simple" Village by producing a wine with lovely fruity and woody aromas and a fresh, pleasant structure.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2013 Geantet Pansiot Haut Cotes De Nuits

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Pinot Fin is an ancient clone of Pinot Noir that is very rarely found anymore in Burgundy. It has small berries with gives deeper than normal colour and flavour. This wine has a deep ruby color. An expressive nose features notes of cassis, plum and hints of wood spice. There is lovely detail and punch to the solidly concentrated flavors that deliver fine depth on the balanced finish. This is a full-on example that will need a few years of bottle age to soften.

Pinot Fin is an ancient clone of Pinot Noir that is very rarely found anymore in Burgundy. It has small berries with gives deeper than normal colour and flavour. This wine has a deep ruby color. An expressive nose features notes of cassis, plum and hints of wood spice. There is lovely detail and punch to the solidly concentrated flavors that deliver fine depth on the balanced finish. This is a full-on example that will need a few years of bottle age to soften.
Robe claire et incolore; arme d'orange; saveur d'orange sucre.
Triple sec is used in so many cocktails it's hard to pick a favourite. It adds zesty orange flavour to margaritas and daiquiris and is that subtle note in cosmopolitans. A must-have for any home bar.

McGuinness is well known for making quality liqueurs. This latest offering is vibrant pink in colour with attractive aromas and flavours of ruby red grapefruit and citrus peel. Medium-bodied with a medium long finish and slightly sweet; enjoy this is in a highball glass with club soda over ice better a meal.

"BEN is made from 100% Vermentino, a grape varietal indigenous to Tuscany and found along the entire Mediterranean coast. The ideal microclimate here in Southern Maremma, not far from the Tyrrhenian coast, gives BEN its refreshing taste and subtle hint of saline minerality." (Producer's note.)

93 points: "A juicy and rich red with chocolate and berrycharacter, hints of coffee and a long andflavorful finish. Medium body, softtannins and a delicious finish. A wine that makes you want todrink it. Enjoynow." - James Suckling, October 2017

Aroma with notes of lemon and white flowers. Fresh, lightand balanced in the palate with a very elegant finish.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Volnay 1er Cru Les Fremiets Domaine Tawse
Volnay 1er Cru Les Fremiets Domaine Tawse

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Located in Carleton Place, Ontario, Stalwart Brewing Co. is creating noteworthy beer. Let your senses wrap themselves around aromas and flavours of citrus, passionfruit, pineapple, malt, pine resin and pleasingly bitter hops. Medium-bodied and softly carbonated, this is ideal for roast beef sandwiches and kettle chips.

Located in Carleton Place, Ontario, Stalwart Brewing Co. is creating noteworthy beer. Let your senses wrap themselves around aromas and flavours of citrus, passionfruit, pineapple, malt, pine resin and pleasingly bitter hops. Medium-bodied and softly carbonated, this is ideal for roast beef sandwiches and kettle chips.

Ce vin d'une grande fracheur rvle des nuances acidules d'agrumes, quelques tonalits herbaces et cette fine minralit qui caractrise les vins du Niagara. nergique, plutt intense, trs structur et dot d'une finale longue et savoureuse. Dlicieux avec le poisson chair blanche grill ou le poulet aux fines herbes.

This wine has great freshness, tangy citrus fruit and grassy tones with a fine Niagara minerality throughout. Zesty and quite intense, with great structure and a long, flavourful finish. Try it with grilled whitefish or herbed chicken.

If you like smooth and refreshing, then this perfect blend of pinot grigio and riesling is the wine for you. Shows delicate aromas of apple, citrus and spice with floral notes. On the palate, this is light and fresh with a hint of sweetness and lemon/lime flavours. Serve at your next casual night in, paired with takeout.

If you like smooth and refreshing, then this perfect blend of pinot grigio and riesling is the wine for you. Shows delicate aromas of apple, citrus and spice with floral notes. On the palate, this is light and fresh with a hint of sweetness and lemon/lime flavours. Serve at your next casual night in, paired with takeout.

The name says it all: simply smooth red. Enjoy its forward dark berry, plum and baking spice aromas and flavours. The palate is soft, rounded and smooth with a wonderful juicy berry finish. Enjoy anytime, on its own or with your favourite takeout or delivery. Serve lightly chilled to enhance the refreshingly smooth style.

Bright and crisp wine from the Luberri estate, showing off a bouquet of flowers and citrus fruits. A nice combo of Viura and Malvasa, it is clean on the palate with a similar array of fruitiness and floral arrangements. Fresh finish.

Bright and crisp wine from the Luberri estate, showing off a bouquet of flowers and citrus fruits. A nice combo of Viura and Malvasa, it is clean on the palate with a similar array of fruitiness and floral arrangements. Fresh finish.

This wine utilizes the technique of carbonic maceration during fermentation, which means the grapes are not crushed in the process. The result is a wonderfully fresh and fruity wine, which is very smooth on the palate and also has great balance. Perfect with food and very easy to drink on its own.

Smooth and velvety Crianza here with offerings of blackberries and dark cherries, backed by comforting notes of leather and spices. A medium bodied wine to enjoy with food or on its own.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Luberri Cepas Viejas V de Pago 2015
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015-Luberri Cepas Viejas V De Pago Rioj

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Made from 70 year old Tempranillo grapes this really shows off lovely dark cherry and balsamic notes. Back this up with warm baking spices and sandalwood to give it a dense, rich, and wonderful structure. Long, satisfying finish. Drink or hold.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2015-Luberri Cepas Viejas V De Pago Rioj

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Luberri Seis de Luberri Media Crianza 2016

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Made form 100% Tempranillo this is a classic and easily approachable Rioja. Violets, combined with red and black fruits give this wine a fruity bouquet with a slight smokey nuance on the palate. A fine balance between fruit and earth.

90 points Antonio Galloni (Vinous) "Bright ruby-red. Emphatically fruity nose displays fresh raspberry and cherry scents accented by a hint of fresh rose. Sappy and gently sweet on the palate, offering energetic, deep flavors of red and dark berries. Closes gently tannic and long, leaving a subtle note of white pepper behind."

Sappy and gently sweet on the palate, offering energetic, deep flavors of red and dark berries. Closes gently tannic and long, leaving a subtle note of white pepper behind."
Made from 100% Semillion this has a delicate floral bouquet with intense flavours of mango, quince and ginger. Rich on the palate with good acidity to give balance.

This is top quality Sauternes here with loads of candied lemons, ripe peaches, mandarin oranges, roasted pineapples, and a touch of almonds. Perfectly balanced sweetness which is nicely cleaned up by the mouthwatering acidity. Length goes on and on.

Expect plenty of almond and spice aromas overtop ripe grapefruit and tangerines. The palate is medium-bodied with a satisfying mellifluous texture, and at last the botrytis is evident. It has a lovely seam of orange zest that cuts through the honeyed fruit, leading to a finish that is very composed and exhibits satisfying length.

It has a perfumed and quite floral bouquet with dried yellow flowers intermixed with wild honey and quince aromas. The palate is very well balanced with pure botrytised fruit and a citrus-fresh, blood orange-tinged finish

A ruby red sangria with its own identity with primary wine aromas of red berries combined with blueberries and cherries. Soft citrus aromas fused with sweet notes of cinnamon. The palate is different, soft, sweet with a refreshing aftertaste.

A ruby red sangria with its own identity with primary wine aromas of red berries combined with blueberries and cherries. Soft citrus aromas fused with sweet notes of cinnamon. The palate is different, soft, sweet with a refreshing aftertaste.

Sangria that evokes all the Mediterranean flavour, made with a fruity white wine of clean and citrus aromas. When pouring in the cup it delights us with a cascade of citrus and tropical aromas, on the palate it surprises us with an explosion of flavours with a refreshing and unforgettable end.

A blend of 57% Chardonnay and 43% Pinot Noir, the Celebris spends 10 years in bottle before disgorgement. Notes of green apple, bright lemon zest and brioche come through on a youthful and lifted nose. The palate is steely, with great tension revealing pink grapefruit and crisp green apple. The mousse is fine and persistent with the expansive smoky brioche and buttery biscuit notes.

A blend of 57% Chardonnay and 43% Pinot Noir, the Celebris spends 10 years in bottle before disgorgement. The mousse is fine and persistent with the expansive smoky brioche and buttery biscuit notes.

White wine made from a selection of the three best whiteVarieties in the Region: Alvarinho, Loureiro and Avesso. Alvarinho conveys structure and body, Loureiro aromatic intensity and Avesso acidity and minerality. Floral, fruity aroma. Fresh, fruity flavour. Good structure and well-balanced.

White wine from the Loureiro grape variety, grown in the River Lima Valley.

Mauro Molino is another of the La Morra growers who produce accessible wines that also happen to be well-priced. This Barbera reveals a soft-textured expression of dark red fruit in a fresh, accessible style. Molino ages his Barbera for roughly six months in steel.

92 points Wine Spectator "This is polished, with scents of vanilla and toasty oak introducing flavors of cherry, plum, licorice and tar. Rich and complex, showing finesse on the mouthwatering aftertaste."

92 points Wine Spectator "This is polished, with scents of vanilla and toasty oak introducing flavors of cherry, plum, licorice and tar. Rich and complex, showing finesse on the mouthwatering aftertaste."

Opens with orange pith, mint and oak spice aromas. A burst of ripe citrus fruit and mineral flavours in the mouth; lively, juicy and penetrating. Not especially oaky in the middle palate, but spicy on the persistent finish.

A hugely pleasing, big wine packed with dark red fruit. It is an excellent choice for drinking over the next few years. Crushed flowers, mint and tobacco are some of the notes that wrap around the firm yet well-balanced finish.

Beautiful, clean, and mineral driven arneis here, with overtones of pear drop and honey. Crisp and refreshing.

A very pretty expression of Dolcetto. Juicy dark cherries, flowers and spices flesh out in this expressive, medium-bodied, gracious wine. This is a fairly refreshing, floral Dolcetto for the vintage.

"Bright straw colour with a green hue. Pure nose, spicy and aromatic with wild herbs, almond, nuts, citrus and white fleshed fruit. Medium bodied, a slight hint of sweetness on the palate, green apple, pear and candied citrus, fresh and balanced backbone of acidity and a fairly long finish." (Andreas Larsson, 2018. Best Sommelier of the World, 2007).

"Bright straw colour with a light golden hue. Intense nose, aromatic with herbal notes like mint, lemon, lime and fresh apple. Good grip on the palate, fine extract and acidity with an herbal spiciness, crisp fruit, bold texture and good length." (Andreas Larsson, 2018, Best Sommelier of the World, 2007).

A seriously fruit-forward style of Barbaresco that on the nose is loaded up on sweet morello cherries, mocha-scented oak, treacle and vanilla. Extremely full-bodied, chewy and intense, but the acidity carries it through to the full-throttle finish.

A seriously fruit-forward style of Barbaresco that on the nose is loaded up on sweet morello cherries, mocha-scented oak, treacle and vanilla. Extremely full-bodied, chewy and intense, but the acidity carries it through to the full-throttle finish.

Freshly cut flowers, mint, sweet red berries and cinnamon all grace the palate in a delineated, vibrant Nebbiolo endowed with pure class. Impeccably balanced and absolutely delicious, the Langhe Nebbiolo is arguably the best wine for the money in this range. The Langhe Nebbiolo emerges from the Basarin vineyard in Neive, and could easily be sold as a Barbaresco.

Dark tones of black cherry, plum and chocolate mark this brooding red. The dense texture and dusty tannins suggest this will evolve over the next several years. Fine length.

This beautiful sake starts out lush and fruity, with a weighty mouthfeel, then morphs into a light and dry finish. Aromas of tropical fruits, ripe pineapple and banana are followed by flavors of dry pear and kiwi.

The palate hasa lovely balance with a great breadth ofnutty, savoury fruit and aseamlessly integrated acidity. Don't be afraid to let this one sit!Once theCoule de Serrant has been opened, it will improve for several days

These ancient vines, originally planted by monks in 1130, createa stunning yellow colourwith a nose that already shows the richness anddepth of this wine. It has a complexbouquet with ripe yellow fruits, hintsof orange and spices. The full-bodied wine is dense,fleshy with a honeycharacter and a superb mineral backbone. It is the perfect example ofharmony.

These ancient vines, originally planted by monks in 1130, createa stunning yellow colourwith a nose that already shows the richness anddepth of this wine. It has a complexbouquet with ripe yellow fruits, hintsof orange and spices. The full-bodied wine is dense,fleshy with a honeycharacter and a superb mineral backbone. It is the perfect example ofharmony.

The deep golden yellow colour of this stunning wine can onlycome from the age ofthe vines which have been harvest for 875consecutive years. With soft aromas of pear,baked apple, and honey. Thisslightly off dry wine has a hint of apple, slight almond, nutty flavourand a well-balanced acidity for a lovely finish.

Thisslightly off dry wine has a hint of apple, slight almond, nutty flavourand a well-balanced acidity for a lovely finish.

From 30 year old vines grown on limestone soil with southern exposure, hand-harvested grapes, destemmed and cold-soaked, aged 6 months in stainless steel tanks. Bright ruby with a fruity nose, good intensity, on palate is nice a round and well-balanced between complexity and freshness with lovely raspberry layers. Pair with charcuteries, and pork and simple fare. Age-worthy for 3-5 years.

Pair with charcuteries, and pork and simple fare. Age-worthy for 3-5 years.

A ruby-red colour. An opened nose, very fruity. In the mouth, a good attack on red fruits. A light-bodied wine with hints of raspberries and spices, and a long, well-structured finish. It is best drunk "chambr" (at room temperature), either on its own or with a meal or soft cheeses.

Lush and ripe, with alluring pear, quince and Mirabelle plus fruit flavor that glide through, inlaid with fine acidity and a flashof mineralirty to keep this fresh and pure, while light verbena and honeysuckle notes add Nuance throughout. Drink now through 2028.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Les Notes de Louis Côtes du Rhône 2016
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016 Les Notes De Louis Cotes Du'Rhone

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This Cte du Rhne is made from almost 100% Grenache from the very good 2016 vintage. It is a brilliant ruby colour and exhibits a pronounced, lively nose of raspberries, plums and cherries. In the mouth these persist, accompanied by black currants and hints of pepper and licorice. It is big and wonderfully round and supple with silky tannins and surprising length. This stunner will go marvellously with savoury tarts and grilled meats. While drinking well now, it will keep nicely for at least three or four years.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 2016 Les Notes De Louis Cotes Du'Rhone

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Domaine des Chézeaux Chambolle-Musigny 1er cru "Les Charmes" 2015

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This Corton is a Bourgogne's iconic - highly complex, impressively mouth-filling solid and opulent wine, in a way that is sensual and structured. Generous aromatic expression is of fruit notes (blueberry, gooseberry, kirsch cherry) or flowers (violet), evolving towards underbrush, animal, leather, fur, pepper and liquorice. On the palate this wine is well-built, powerful and muscular and the chewy body comes to the fore. Firm, frank and fat, it requires time (4-12 years) to reach its peak.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Domaine des Chézeaux Chambolle-Musigny 1er cru "Les Charmes" 2015

Generous aromatic expression is of fruit notes (blueberry, gooseberry, kirsch cherry) or flowers (violet), evolving towards underbrush, animal, leather, fur, pepper and liquorice. On the palate this wine is well-built, powerful and muscular and the chewy body comes to the fore. Firm, frank and fat, it requires time (4-12 years) to reach its peak.

On the palate the wine is velvety and distinguished - the Pinot Noir at the top of its form. The wine may seem a little austere in its youth; it needs time in the bottle to develop structure and fleshy texture. Full-bodied and voluptuous, this wine is the equivalent of a Rubens nude.

PrimaryInformation.Description: The Glenlivet French Oak Reserve 15 Year Old

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Robe cristalline de teinte or moyen; flaveurs de crme brule, de pomme sucre et de lavande, avec des notes dlicatement fumes et tourbes; riche et complexe en finale.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Whisky écossais The Glenlivet 15 ans d'âge French Oak Reserve

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The unique use of French Oak increases the intensity of the whisky, resulting in a richer and creamier finish along with a distinctive spiciness. Deep golden in colour expect aromas and flavours of crme brle, sweet apple, gentle smokiness and peat alongside of lavendar notes followed by a rich and complex finish.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: 90 points James Suckling (Apr 2018) "Blackcurrant aromas and an array of woody spices, leading to a palate with a sinewy acid and tannin interplay. Plenty of toasty oak punch, especially at the limit."

"Cherry, eucalyptus, menthol and wild herb flavors are the main themes in this supple, aromatic red. Balanced, showing dusty tannins for support and bright acidity to keep the flavors in relief. Offers a terrific finish, with a lingering aftertaste of fruit, spice and mineral. Best from 2021 through 2042.?B.S." 94 points (Wine Spectator).

Les effets de la fermentation en fts sont vidents, mais ce sont les saveurs de pamplemousse et de pche chair blanche qui font persister la finale. Un vin qui voluera lentement et devra passer au moins cinq ans en bouteille. Dgustez-le d'ici 2023.

Barrel ferment characters are evident, but it is the grapefruit and white peach that drives the extreme length of the palate and its aftertaste. This is a wine that will develop slowly and surely with a minimum of 5 years in bottle. Drink By: 2023.

12 Il Palazzino Stagi Igt Toscana (Marc Di Grazia)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Vin 100 % colorino de la maison Il Palazzino, le Stagi 2012 est fabuleux. Les tanins typiquement rudes du colorino ont t bien apprivoiss, tandis que le fruit mr et rac du millsime se manifeste clairement. Des notes trs mres de cerise rouge, de prune, de ptale de rose et d'pices exotiques s'intensifient sur la finale flamboyante. Malgr son intensit, le 2012 est un vin mi-cors qui met l'accent sur la structure. J'adore!

The 2012 Stagi, Il Palazzino's 100% Colorino, is fabulous. The tannins that are so common in Colorino are nicely domesticated, while the ripe, racy fruit of the vintage comes through nicely. Super-ripe red cherry, plum, rose petal and exotic spice notes build into the flamboyant finish. Even with all of its intensity, the 2012 is a midweight wine with a lot of emphasis on structure. I loved it.

High rye concentration and limestone filtration along with highly charred barrels give this whisky a clear golden amber colour and aromas of rich toffee, roasted grain, spice and smoky oak notes. The palate is full body and smooth with flavours of vanilla, apple, sweet spice and smoky oak followed by a long finish.

Quatre-vingt-trois pour cent du raisin provient du vignoble Monte Rosso de Sonoma, le reste d'autres vignobles de Sonoma. L'assemblage comprend 97 % de cabernet sauvignon et 3 % de petite sirah, levs en fts de chne franais (53 % neuf). Ici encore, la maturit est vidente grce un taux d'alcool de 15,7 %, mais le vin ne prsente nanmoins aucune trace de chaleur. D'une stature, d'une intensit et d'une puissance considrables, ce vin muscl, maussade et plutt primordial devra passer un an ou deux au cellier, mais il durera de 25 30 ans par la suite. La patience est de mise. Priode de consommation : 2017 2048.

83% from the Monte Rosso Vineyard in Sonoma and the rest from other Sonoma sources. It is a blend of 97% Cabernet Sauvignon and 3% Petite Sirah aged in 53% new French oak. Again, ripeness is well-noted in the 15.7% alcohol, but there is not a bit of heat to the wine's overall character. A wine of considerable stature, gravitas, intensity and full-bodied power, it is muscular, backward and somewhat primordial, this wine needs a good 1-2 more years bottle age and should last for 25-30 years. Patience, please. Drink Date: 2017-2048.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Whisky J.P. Wiser Alumni Series Guy Lafleur

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The Alumni Association and J.P. Wiser's have pair up to create this elegant whisky in honour of hockey great and Hall of Famer Guy "The Flower" Lafleur. Look for aromas and flavours of honey, toffee, caramel, vanilla and spice. Peach and kernel notes lead to a medium-bodied and fruity finish. Serve as an after-dinner treat.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: J'ai l'impression de retourner dans le temps, car j'ai pass en revue le millsime 2012 l'an dernier pour vous en donner un avant-got. Mais peu importe. Cette lgante cuve assemble les cpages tempranillo et graciano; le premier est issu de Rioja Alta, et le second de la rgion de Rioja Oriental. Les armes de fruits ronceux pics mnent une bouche succulente, quilibre et agrablement balsamique. Priode de consommation : 2018 2023.

I seem to be going backwards in time here, given that I reviewed the 2012 last year as a kind of sneak preview. No matter. This is a stylish cuve of Tempranillo and Graciano, the former from the Rioja Alta, the latter from the Rioja Oriental. Spicy brambly fruit segues into a palate that's savoury, balanced and appealingly balsamic. Drink Date: 2018-23.

Cette lgante cuve assemble les cpages tempranillo et graciano; le premier est issu de Rioja Alta, et le second de la rgion de Rioja Oriental. Les armes de fruits ronceux pics mnent une bouche succulente, quilibre et agrablement balsamique. Priode de consommation : 2018 2023.

I seem to be going backwards in time here, given that I reviewed the 2012 last year as a kind of sneak preview. No matter. Spicy brambly fruit segues into a palate that's savoury, balanced and appealingly balsamic. Drink Date: 2018-23.

PrimaryInformation.Description: Whisky canadien J.P. Wiser's Alumni Whisky Series Lanny Mcdonald

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: The Alumni Association, J.P. Wiser's and Lanny McDonald form a first line trio to create this one-time whisky release. It is aged for nine years in Canadian and virgin oak barrels. Look for well-aimed notes of apricot, honey, vanilla and nutmeg. Baking spice and dried fruit notes set up a full-bodied and flavourful finish.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: G. Marquis The Silver Line Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
PrimaryInformation.Description: 16 G. Marquis Cab Sau The Silver Line

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Un cabernet sauvignon massif, juteux et frais. Le bouquet est magnifique et la bouche l'est tout autant avec ses notes impressionnantes de fruits noirs mrs, de cassis juteux, de fines herbes et d'pices. Longue finale frache et nergique. Dlicieux avec un steak mi-saignant.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Cabernet Sauvignon The Silver Line G. Marquis

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This is a big, juicy, fresh Cabernet. The nose is beautiful and the palate follows through with impressive ripe dark fruit, juicy cassis, herbs and spice. Great freshness and drive throughout the long finish. Enjoy with medium-rare steak.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Michelle Bouffard de winealign.com a accord la note de 90 points ce vin qui a remport une mdaille d'or au Concours des meilleurs vins du Canada 2018. Il a t lev en ft d'acacia franais qui impart de charmantes notes mielles florales ses nuances d'agrumes, de pomme et de fruits tropicaux. Ce vin de glace floral, opulent et quilibr soutenu par une acidit frache et vive est un excellent exemple du style ontarien classique. Il est suffisamment riche pour qu'on le boive seul, mais il sera aussi dlicieux avec un sorbet la mangue et la banane.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Vin de glace Vidal Lundy Manor

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This wine was awarded 90 points by Michelle Bouffard of winealign.com and earned a Gold Medal at the 2018 National Wine Awards of Canada. It was aged in French acacia barrels, which adds a lovely floral honeyed note to the citrus, apple and tropical tones. This floral, lush, balanced, crisp Icewine with its fresh, lively acidity is a fine example of this classic Ontario style. Rich enough to enjoy on its own, it will also be great with a mango-banana sorbet.

Double-distilled Kilbeggan Single Grain pours pale gold. Like a whiskey eddy, its aromas of vanilla and honey ebb and flow with notes of cinnamon and baked apple. The flavours enter your mouth on a gentle wave of butterscotch sending out ripples of cinnamon and baked apple. The finish is silky smooth. Pair with apple flan.

Double-distilled Kilbeggan Single Grain pours pale gold. Like a whiskey eddy, its aromas of vanilla and honey ebb and flow with notes of cinnamon and baked apple. The flavours enter your mouth on a gentle wave of butterscotch sending out ripples of cinnamon and baked apple. The finish is silky smooth. Pair with apple flan.

This moscato is lightly effervescent and exotically aromatic in style. Forward aromas and flavours of ripe peach, apricot, lychee and orange blossom leap from the glass. On the palate, it's soft and delicately sweet with a refreshingly light spritz. Perfect on its own and with fruit-based desserts or lightly spiced dishes.

This moscato is lightly effervescent and exotically aromatic in style. Forward aromas and flavours of ripe peach, apricot, lychee and orange blossom leap from the glass. On the palate, it's soft and delicately sweet with a refreshingly light spritz. Perfect on its own and with fruit-based desserts or lightly spiced dishes.

A value-priced local chardonnay that is sure to please most. Clear pale straw colour. On the nose, it expresses wonderful aromas of flowers, fresh apples, peach and citrus with notes of honey and spice. The palate is rounded and refreshing showing delicate flavours of apple, melon and citrus with hints of smoke and spice.

A value-priced local chardonnay that is sure to please most. Clear pale straw colour. On the nose, it expresses wonderful aromas of flowers, fresh apples, peach and citrus with notes of honey and spice. The palate is rounded and refreshing showing delicate flavours of apple, melon and citrus with hints of smoke and spice.

This easy drinking, approachable local red blend won gold at the All Canadian Wine Awards. Medium ruby colour. Expect aromas of black fruit, plum and cherry with delicate spicy notes. On the palate, it's medium-bodied and fruity with a spiced, juicy berry finish. Perfect with good friends and good food.

This easy drinking, approachable local red blend won gold at the All Canadian Wine Awards. Medium ruby colour. Expect aromas of black fruit, plum and cherry with delicate spicy notes. On the palate, it's medium-bodied and fruity with a spiced, juicy berry finish. Perfect with good friends and good food.

A vibrant, crowd-pleasing blend from Ontario. Clear pale lemon; pronounced aromas of pear, citrus, green apple and peach; off-dry, with a medium body and acidity supporting flavours of pear, apple, peach, citrus and tropical fruit; a crisp, balanced finish. Great on its own or paired to appetizers and mildly spiced dishes.

A vibrant, crowd-pleasing blend from Ontario. Clear pale lemon; pronounced aromas of pear, citrus, green apple and peach; off-dry, with a medium body and acidity supporting flavours of pear, apple, peach, citrus and tropical fruit; a crisp, balanced finish. Great on its own or paired to appetizers and mildly spiced dishes.

Crowd-pleasing, aromatic white that's locally produced. Exhibits exotic aromas of passion fruit, orange blossom and spice. In the mouth, it's dry, light and refreshing with a smooth palate and flavors of white peach, pear and mandarine with floral and tropical fruit notes. Enjoy on its own or with seafood and Asian cuisine.

In the mouth, it's dry, light and refreshing with a smooth palate and flavors of white peach, pear and mandarine with floral and tropical fruit notes. Enjoy on its own or with seafood and Asian cuisine.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Poggio San Polo Brunello di Montalcino 2010

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le Brunello di Montalcino San Polo 2010 est un vin magnifique d'une profonde puret aromatique et d'une grande complexit. Le bouquet livre des parfums caractristiques de petits fruits, de tapis forestier, de violette presse, d'pices douces, de rglisse et de cola. Les armes purs et intenses gagnent en intensit l'aration dans le verre. La bouche de ce fabuleux vin est dlicate et lgre, mais elle rvle une grande personnalit et beaucoup de persistance. L'ensemble respire l'lgance et la finesse. Un vin fortement recommand issu d'un millsime classique. savourer aprs 2017.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Brunello di Montalcino Poggio San Polo

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Poggio San Polo's 2010 Brunello di Montalcino is a beautiful wine with a deep sense of aromatic purity and complexity. The bouquet delivers characteristic tones of small berry, forest floor, pressed violets, sweet spice, licorice and cola. Those aromas are both pure and intense, and build in momentum as the wine takes on more air in the glass. This is a fantastic effort with a mouthfeel that is as delicate and light as its it is meaningful and long-lasting. The overall effect is one of elegance and finesse. This is a highly recommendable achievement from a classic vintage. Open this bottle after 2017.

Le Ctes-du-Ventoux Cuve des Terrasses 2015 est un superbe vin compos 60 % de grenache et 40 % de syrah lev dans une combinaison de fts et de foudres de deux quatre ans d'ge. Mi-cors cors, poli, soyeux et sans angles durs, il se veut typiquement sud-rhodanien avec ses notes d'herbes de Provence, de garrigue, de rglisse et de framboise noire mre. Achetez-en une caisse et savourez-le au cours des cinq ou six prochaines annes.

A smoking good 2015 that readers should snatch up is the 2015 Cotes du Ventoux Cuvee des Terrasses, which is 60% Grenache and 40% Syrah that's aged in a combination of two- to four-year-old barrels and foudres. Medium to full-bodied, polished, silky and with no hard edges, it has classic Southern Rhone notes of Provencal spices, garrigue, licorice and ripe black raspberries. Buy a case and drink bottles over the coming 5-6 years.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Bouchard Père & Fils Les Clous Meursault 2016

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin riche et butyreux offre des armes et saveurs de pche, de miel, d'pices et de minraux. Complexit attrayante et longue finale d'agrumes, de pierre et d'pices. boire jusqu'en 2023.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Meursault Les Clous Domaine Bouchard Père & Fils

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This is rich and buttery, evoking peach, honey, spice and mineral aromas and flavors. Delivers nice complexity and a long, citrus-, stone- and spice-filled finish. Drink now through 2023.

This is a fruity, dry, and refreshing tasting ros (rosato) made from Sangiovese. In fact, the area of Italy where this wine is made (Romagna) is where the grape originated. Expect lovely fresh strawberries, sour cherries, and a bit of floral notes to top off this versatile wine.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le Ilatraia 2013 vous en met plein les sens! Trois fois j'ai dgust ce vin formidable l'aveugle, trois fois il a remport la palme haut la main. Le cabernet sauvignon (40 %) est combin du petit verdot (40%) et du cabernet franc (20 %). La complexit et la nature changeante du bouquet sont poustouflantes. L'Ilatraia est d'une profondeur et d'un raffinement incroyables qui en impressionneront plus d'un. Il affiche une robe profonde aux reflets rubis clatant, et prsente une texture immensment tendre, souple et fluide. Des saveurs de fruits noirs et de mre mnent de lgres notes de tabac, de noix grille et de terre brle. Il est d'une complexit couper le souffle. Priode de consommation : 2017 2030.

Wow. The 2013 Ilatraia jumps right out at you. This is a tremendous effort - I tasted this wine three times blind and it always came out on top. Cabernet Sauvignon (40%) is blended with Petit Verdot (40%) and Cabernet Franc (20%). The complexity and the ever-changing nature of the bouquet is mind-bending. Ilatraia shows enormous depth and sophistication, and it leaves a profound impact. The wine sports deep color saturation with brilliant flashes of dark ruby. The texture is immensely soft, yielding and seamless in its integration. Dark fruit and blackberry is followed by light notes of tobacco, toasted nut and scorched earth. I am in awe of its complexity. Drink Date: 2017-2030.

La rgion chaude de Paso Robles produit des cabernets sauvignons massifs. Provenant d'un vignoble sis au sommet d'une colline du domaine J. Lohr, ce vin profond, tendre et riche livre des saveurs trs mres de cerise noire, de kirsch, de chocolat et de haschisch noir. Il est moelleux jusqu' un certain point en raison de son taux d'alcool considrable, et culmine sur une finale de chocolat amer et d'herbes. La longueur est excellente.

The warm Paso Robles region delivers big cabs. Sourced from a mature 'Hilltop" vineyard on J. Lohr's home estate, this is a dark, deep, soft and rich cabernet with super-ripe black cherry/kirsch, chocolate, black hashish herbality. It is smooth to a point with considerable alcohol, bitter chocolate and herbs on the finish. The length is excellent.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Santa Margherita Brut Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce prosecco serait le chouchou des clbrits. Ce n'est pas surprenant: il est riche et frais, et ses bulles sont vives et agrables. De la maison qui produit le vin blanc le plus vendu chez Vintages, ce mousseux est d'un excellent rapport qualit-prix.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore Brut Santa Margherita

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: We've heard this Prosecco is a celebrity favourite. That's not surprising because it is distinctive, rich and fresh with vibrant, satisfying bubbles. From the producer of Vintages' top-selling white wine, this sparkler over-delivers for the price.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Portez un toast la Saint-Patrick avec cet ensemble qui comprend le Whiskey irlandais Jameson Caskmates Beau's (750 mL), un whiskey de triple distillation offert en exclusivit la LCBO, quatre canettes de la fameuse bire Lug Tread de Beau's, deux verres de service et un verre doseur de marque muni d'une agrafe.

Raise a toast on St. Patrick's Day with this gift set that has everything you need to celebrate with friends, including triple-distilled Jameson Beau's Caskmates Irish Whiskey 750 mL, an LCBO Exclusive, and a four-pack of Ontario favourite Beau's Lug Tread beer. Also included is a set of two tumblers and hitchhiker clip.

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Jean Pabiot Domaine des Fines Caillottes Pouilly-Fumé 2015
PrimaryInformation.Description: 17 P.Fume Dom Des Fines Caillottes (Jean Pabi

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: La rgion de Pouilly-Fum est connue, on le devine bien, par ses sauvignons blancs fums et l'exemple que voici en est un superbe spcimen. Bien toff et dot de saveurs rondes et fraches et d'une longue finale, ce vin rvle les notes minrales et de silex fum caractristiques qui font l'attrait et la rputation de l'appellation. Bien quilibr, mr et bien fait, ce vin qui met l'eau la bouche est une interprtation classique du style.

Pouilly-Fum is famous for its smoky (Fum) Sauvignon Blanc and this one is bang on. Nicely weighted with round, fresh flavours and a long finish, this has the textbook smoky flint and mineral notes so desirable in these wines. Well balanced, ripe and well made, this is a mouthwatering classically styled example.

PrimaryInformation.Description: 16 Chateauneuf Du Pape Rouge (Le Vieux Donjon)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce chteauneuf-du-pape du millsime 2015 est un assemblage classique 75 % de grenache, 10 % de syrah, 10 % de mourvdre et 5 % de cinsault, issus surtout de sols de galets rouls. Les raisins sont partiellement grapps et le vin est lev 15 mois en foudres. Il rvle une profonde robe rubis-pourpre, une bouche riche et corse soutenue par des tanins tendres et des notes sud-rhodaniennes caractristiques de viande salaisonne, d'pices grilles et de garrigue sur un gnreux fond de fruits rouges et noirs. Il montrera ses plus belles qualits pendant au moins deux dcennies.

The 2015 Chteauneuf du Pape is a classic blend of 75% Grenache, 10% Syrah, 10% Mourvdre and 5% Cinsault, mostly from rolled stone terroirs, that was partially destemmed and will see 15 months all in foudre. It boasts a deep ruby/purple color as well as full-bodied richness, sweet tannin and textbook Southern Rhne notes of cured meats, toasted spice, garrigue and ample red and black fruits. It will have two decades or more of prime drinking.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin droit et lgant offre des nuances de cerise rouge, de fraise sauvage, de rose, de violette, d'pices douces et de rglisse releves d'une note balsamique. Les tanins souples le rendent dj accessible, mais la vive acidit lui donnera de la longvit. boire entre 2018 et 2028.

Red cherry, wild strawberry, rose, violet, sweet spices, licorice and balsamic notes all come together on this straightforward, elegant wine. Supple tannins make this already accessible, but brisk acidity will give it longevity. Drink 2018-2028.

Robe jaune ple. Ce vin rvle un bouquet plus mr et pic que celui du mcon-chardonnay 2016 du mme producteur avec ses armes de pamplemousse et de gingembre. Ce vin rond, tendre et cors rvle des saveurs d'ananas, de pamplemousse et de citron, mais il est encore un peu brouillon. La finale est un peu rude, mais l'ensemble est plus toff et tendre que le mcon-chardonnay.

Pale yellow. Riper and spicier on the nose than this producer's 2016 Mcon-Chardonnay, offering aromas of grapefruit and ginger. A round, sweet wine with good body to its pineapple, grapefruit and lemon flavors but still a tad blurry. Finishes slightly harsh but with more stuffing and sweetness than the Mcon-Chardonnay.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Comme le Prado Enea n'a pas t produit en 2007 ni 2008, nous tournons notre attention vers le phnomnal 2009. Ce vin est issu de vignobles de climat frais qui ont tir profit de 20 jours additionnels de maturation lente comparativement aux secteurs plus chauds, assurant ainsi des raisins parfaitement mrs et des saveurs profondes. Cet assemblage comprenant 70% de tempranillo, 20 % de garnacha et le reste de mazuelo et de graciano, a t lev longuement, pas moins de trois ans dans ce cas-ci, en fts de chne neufs et usags. Le vin demeure trs jeune et je sais que le vinificateur Jorge Muga prfrerait le laisser vieillir davantage en bouteille avant de le lancer, mais les amateurs risquent de s'impatienter parce que cette cuve n'a pas t produite depuis 2006. Le vin affiche un taux d'alcool de 14,1% et un pH tonnant de 3,34, compte tenu du fait que le millsime 2009 a t gnralement chaud et mr. Cette cuve semble obtenir de trs bons rsultats dans les millsimes mrs. Le vin se montre jeune mme en bouche, et il est clair qu'il faudra lui laisser le temps de dvelopper la complexit et la texture soyeuse qui font le renom de ce vin. La bouche est bien quilibre et tous les lments sont en place pour assurer un bon vieillissement en bouteille. En fait, le 2009 voque les excellents Prado Enea des millsimes rcents. Le Prado Enea ne sera pas produit en 2012 et 2013 non plus, mais en 2010, 2014 (petites quantits) et 2015. Avec une telle qualit, son prix est trs avantageux. Priode de consommation : 2017

The most classic cuve was not produced in 2007 or 2008, so we jumped to the phenomenal 2009 Prado Enea. It was produced with grapes from cooler vineyards that enjoyed 20 extra days of slow ripening compared with warmer zones, which provided them with perfect ripeness and deep flavors. This blend of 70% Tempranillo, 20% Garnacha and the remaining 10% between Mazuelo and Graciano had an extended levage, in this case no less than three years (alternating newer and older barrels). This is still a baby and I know Winemaker Jorge Muga would like to keep it in bottle for longer before selling it, but the commercial pressure is tremendous, as there has been no wine since 2006. The wine has 14.1% alcohol and a surprising 3.34 pH, especially considering 2009 was generally a warm and ripe year. But somehow this cuve seems to work very well in ripe vintages. The wine feels even younger on the palate, and it still needs to develop some further complexity and the silky texture for which this wine is famous. There is good balance here and all the elements are in place for a nice development in bottle. In fact, it feels like one of the great recent vintages of Prado Enea. There will be no Prado Enea in 2012 and 2013 either, but it's produced in 2010, 2014 (small quantities) and 2015. At this quality level, the price seems like a real bargain. Drink date: 2017-2029.

Un nom lgendaire pour les amateurs de sak. Celui-ci est labor dans un style bien-aim qui penche du ct doux de cette boisson. Il est lgrement filtr et se dguste idalement avec des mets plutt relevs. Vu sa forte teneur en riz, il est recommand de bien agiter la bouteille avant de le servir.

A legendary name for sake lovers, this beloved style tends toward the sweeter side of the spirit. Lightly filtered, it goes best with spicy dishes. And because of its high rice content, be sure to shake the bottle every time before pouring.

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Armes de mre, de terre mouille, de lavande et de bleuet. La bouche corse, profonde et tage rvle une acidit clatante et une finale fruite aux notes de gras de bacon, de champignon et de viande fume. Tanins souples. Un vin unique boire ds maintenant ou laisser mrir au cellier.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Chianti Classico Riserva Famiglia Zingarelli Rocca delle Macìe

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Aromas of blackberries, wet earth, lavender and blueberries. Full-bodied, deep and layered with bright acidity and a bacon-fat, mushroom, smoked-meat and fruit aftertaste. Soft tannins, too. A unique wine. Drink now or hold.

16 La Rosa Douro (Quinta De La Rosa)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin robuste et structur rvle une bouche riche et corse. Avec ses tanins mrs et ses saveurs de prune noire, ce vin dense est charg de saveurs robustes et affirmes soutenues par une finale veloute. Il a une longue vie devant lui. boire ds 2017.

This is a solid and structured wine that is rich and full on the palate. With ripe tannins and black plum flavors, it is dense, packed with big, bold flavors and a velvety texture that is looking towards a long future. Drink from 2017.
PrimaryInformation.Description: 16 La Rosa Douro (Quinta De La Rosa)

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Un vin blanc doux et juteux aux nuances de pche et d'abricot glac. La finale crmeuse aux notes de melon mr est releve de tonalits de miel et d'pices. Prt boire.
Peach and glazed apricot notes emerge in this sweet, juicy white. Honey and spice details show on the creamy finish, with some ripe melon accents. Drink now.

Asian pear, pineapple, anise & lemongrass on the nose follow through onto a soft, silky palate with excellent depth & smoothness. Finished long & crisp.

PrimaryInformation.Description: #12 Cab Shiraz Malbec Wolf Blass Black Label (Trea

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Le malbec (5 %, auquel s'ajoutent 54 % de cabernet sauvignon et 41 % de shiraz) se distingue dans un vin juteux aux notes de violette, issu d'un millsime caractris par un t doux aux nuits fraches. Des notes de poivre noir et de douces nuances de pelure de prune donnent de la dimension aux saveurs dfinies de cerise noire, de cassis et de mre de ce Black Label vif. Bien qu'on ait une fois de plus rduit le contact avec le chne neuf et amricain ( 52 % et 22 % respectivement), les notes de moka du vin demeurent l'cart. Requiert un sjour au cellier. Priode de consommation : 2017 2030 et au-del.

The Malbec (5%, versus 54% Cabernet Sauvignon and 41% Shiraz) sings in the juiciness and violet lift of a vintage characterised by a mild summer with cool nights. Black pepper riffs and a gentle pucker of plum skin add layers and interest to this lively Black Label's well-defined black cherry, blackcurrant and blackberry fruit. Though new and American oak is down again (to 52% and 22% respectively), its mocha notes currently sit apart. Needs time. Drink: 2017-2030+.
PrimaryInformation.Description: #12 Cab Shiraz Malbec Wolf Blass Black Label (Trea

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Rocca delle Macìe Campomaccione Morellino di Scansano 2006

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: L'assemblage comprend 90 % de sangiovese, 5 % de cabernet sauvignon et 5 % de merlot. La robe est d'un rouge rubis profond et le bouquet dgage des effluves de cerise noire et de terre chaude. La bouche avenante et corse est de caractre sec, avec des saveurs de cerise noire mre et de chocolat. Finale sche. Un vin bien fait. Accords : ptes en sauce la viande et osso-buco.

A blend of 90% Sangiovese, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Merlot. Deep ruby red; black cherry and warm earth on the nose; dry, full-bodied wine with ripe black cherry fruit and chocolate flavour; easy on the palate with a dry finish. A well made wine. Food match: pasta with meat sauce; osso bucco. [Wines of the Week]

PrimaryInformation.ShortDescription: Willamette Valley Vineyards Estate Pinot Noir 2013

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Ce vin fera frtiller vos papilles. Ses saveurs affirmes et fraches de cerise et de prune sont agrmentes de lgres notes de fines herbes et d'un soupon de chocolat qui gagnent en prcision sur la longue finale. Ce vin mi-cors et solidement charpent montrera ses plus belles qualits au moins jusqu'en 2022.
PrimaryInformation.Description: Pinot Noir Estate Willamette Valley Vineyards

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: This is a real palate-pleaser. Forward, fresh flavors of cherry and plum are accented by light herb notes and finished with a frame of chocolate. It gains precision as it lengthens through the finish, showing medium weight and enough structure to continue to drink well through 2022.

Le bouquet de ce Solaia est vraiment phnomnal avec ses armes de cassis, de mre, de rose et de violette. Trs parfum. Cors, complet et harmonieux, soutenu par des tanins polis et aux saveurs qui persistent pendant plusieurs minutes. Puret et prcision. Le meilleur Solaia ce jour? Il est dj parfaitement buvable, mais il s'panouira pendant de nombreuses annes encore.

The nose to this Solaia is truly phenomenal with currants, blackberries, roses and violets. So perfumed. Full-bodied and everything is in check and harmony with polished tannins that last for minutes. Purity and focus. Is it the greatest Solaia ever? So drinkable already, but this is a wine for ages ahead.

PrimaryInformation.Description: #07 Romitorio Di Santedame Igt Ruffino Tuscan

PrimaryInformation.ExtendedDescription: Vtu d'une robe opaque et trs extrait, ce rouge regorge de saveurs de mre, de bleuet et de grenade. Vif et muscl, il est tannique et s'achve sur une finale dense qui tapisse le palais. Une version ambitieuse du style international. Colorino et merlot. son mieux entre 2014 et 2026.

An inky, extracted style, this red bristles with blackberry, blueberry and pomegranate flavors. Vibrant and well-muscled with tannins, finishing with a dense, mouthcoating sensation. An ambitious version in the international style. Colorino and Merlot. Best from 2014 through 2026.
